results.name: Pegwin
results.description: Summon your Pegwin minion. You chased after it; now it chases after you.
results.enhanced_description: Suddenly appearing in the Gold Saucer alongside the Beans, these winsome little automata love nothing more than being in the thick of a race and chased around like a prize. Rumor has it they were created by a friend of the Beans, who was inspired by a penguin they had witnessed somewhere out there.
results.tooltip: My, what charming little toys.    - Kan-E-Senna

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

results.name: Pink Bean
results.description: Summon your pink Bean minion. Three, two, one...GO!
results.enhanced_description: Little is known about these mysterious life-forms that suddenly appeared in the Gold Saucer apart from the fact that they love to race, and this specimen has apparently decided that it wants to race you without end. Rumor has it that underneath its rotund exterior is a skeleton that looks like a nightmarish amalgam of man and bird, but there is no ready way to determine the truth.
results.tooltip: Let me guess. You've lost...no, broken...no, *traded for magical beans* the parts we need.   - Jessie

verminion.skill_description: Knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Uolosapa
results.description: Summon your uolosapa minion. To fly after you and perch prettily on your head is its divine calling.
results.enhanced_description: One cannot talk about the creatures of the south sea isles without mentioning this pink-beaked sparrow. Since ancient times, its kind have been revered as sacred, and legend speaks of an especially intelligent and friendly specimen that considered itself a servant of the Speaker.
results.tooltip: I seem to have made a feathered friend.    - Fufucha

verminion.skill_description: Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

results.name: Repulu
results.description: Summon your repulu minion. Comes complete with a fetching bow tie to prevent misplacement.
results.enhanced_description: Its name meaning “honored lizard,” this reptile native to Aloalo Island is believed by the locals to be a fountain spirit that brings good fortune to those who accord it due reverence. Whatever the truth of their nature, this particular critter was so impressed with your prowess in battle, it chose to follow you wherever you should go.
results.tooltip: Most colorful, would you not agree?    - Hinageshi

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 40%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Kydonia Strolls
results.description: Summon your Kydonia Strolls minion. For when you need a stony face to stare at you unflinchingly.
results.enhanced_description: This hovering sculpture was made in the likeness of Kydonia Knolls, a peculiar rock formation on the moon's surface resembling a face. Seeking to promote it as a sightseeing destination, a Loporrit asked Khloe Aliapoh to distribute the objects, which occasionally glow with the moonlight that they supposedly harbor.
results.tooltip: The kindness in your heart shines like moonlight on oiled skin.    - Company Muscle

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 13%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Vicarious Vacationer
results.description: Summon your vicarious vacationer minion. A lean, mean, holidaying machine.
results.enhanced_description: This Sharlayan-made automaton was provided to aid in your work on your island sanctuary. An industrious new model, it has been programmed to enjoy its vacation as efficiently and effectively as possible to maximize average rest and relaxation amongst your island workforce.
results.tooltip: Next you'll be telling me you're one of the Warriors of Light, back from a half-decade long holiday!    - Mother Miounne

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Zodiark Idol
results.description: Summon your Zodiark idol minion. When you ask your mother if you can have Zodiark, but she says you already have Zodiark at home.
results.enhanced_description: This automaton was inspired by Zodiark as He was depicted in an ancient cave mural. Held to be the embodiment of Darkness, He is worshipped by the Ascians, who seek to rejoin the sundered world. Even twelve millennia after His defeat at the hands (or feet) of His bitter rival Hydaelyn, His grudge towards Her burns strong.
results.tooltip: For the glory of Lord Zodiark.    - Igeyorhm

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Resurrection -Beyond the Veil- Artbook

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Hydaelyn Idol
results.description: Summon your Hydaelyn idol minion. When you ask your mother if you can have Hydaelyn, but she says you already have Hydaelyn at home.
results.enhanced_description: This automaton was inspired by Hydaelyn as She was depicted in an ancient cave mural. Held to be the will of the star and the embodiment of Light, She guided many a mortal soul in Her age-old conflict with Her bitter rival Zodiark, whom She divided into fourteen parts with─if the artist is to be believed─a mighty kick.
results.tooltip: Please, Mother Hydaelyn! Hearken to our plea! Lend us Your divine Light!    - Minfilia

sources.text: Item code included with Growing Light Original Soundtrack

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
 **Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Fourchenault
results.description: Summon your wind-up Fourchenault minion. Don't even think about dragging it into conflict, or it shall give you a look of sternest disapproval.
results.enhanced_description: A veritable congress of these automata was produced as part of a public relations drive for the Forum. However, a complaint from their unwitting model led to the units being consigned to the storehouse, and it was only later at the scholarch's orders that they now see the light of day as promotional items for an academic publication.
results.tooltip: Gods know Fourchenault's a cranky old goat, so I'm sure you butt heads often enough.    - Theopauldin

sources.text: Item code included with Encyclopaedia Eorzea III

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **critters**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Golbez
results.description: Summon your wind-up Golbez minion. Too small to conceive of and carry out a mass invasion of the Source...or is he?
results.enhanced_description: This automaton modeled after Golbez was discovered in his domain in the depths of the Thirteenth's moon. Perhaps created by one of the black-clad knight's loyal minions, it boasts peerless attention to detail, and exudes an unshakable resolve─albeit on a diminutive scale.
results.tooltip: Golbez? Of course I know of him. Only a fool without ears wouldn't.    - Fearful Voidsent

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Tourmaline Weapon
results.description: Summon your Tourmaline Weapon minion. Stands ready to lend you a helping hand or six.
results.enhanced_description: Retrieved from an imperial base, this scale prototype of a warmachina appears to have been created for heat resistance testing and carries no armaments. After completing their analysis, the Eorzean Alliance saw fit to bestow it upon members as a reward for exemplary service.
results.tooltip: Emeralds will do quite nicely.    - Crystal Merchant

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Oschon
results.description: Summon your wind-up Oschon minion. Guaranteed not to wander off on you.
results.enhanced_description: Upon seeing the manmade wind-up Halone, Nald'thal was taken by a bout of mischievousness and decided to create an automaton of his own using a jewel buried in the earth. While the resultant product assumes the likeness of Oschon, unlike the deity upon whom it is based, it follows its master faithfully rather than wandering freely.
results.tooltip: He's fond of wandering wheresoever his whims take him...    - Krile

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 40.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Ryunosuke
results.description: Summon your Ryunosuke minion. Awww, he thinks he's dragons!
results.enhanced_description: As part of her efforts to introduce the noble ryu, one of the totem animals to usher in a new year in the Far East, the ryu bugyo arranged for this chocobo hatchling to serve as a mascot. For its part, the creature seems to enjoy its role, and wears its outfit with adorable zeal.
results.tooltip: Yes, I can feel the presence of mighty dragons all around us!    - Ohl Deeh

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Wind-up PuPu
results.description: Summon your wind-up PuPu minion. Will bleed you dry of elixirs if you aren't careful.
results.enhanced_description: This automaton was created in the likeness of the alien PuPu by Godbert Manderville, who was inspired by the interstellar visitor's exquisite curves. It is programmed to follow you on your adventures, and has a curious fondness for elixirs.
results.tooltip: Pu...Pu?    - Hildibrand

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

results.name: Kuromaru
results.description: Summon your Kuromaru minion. Because the only thing that's better than a dog is a *ninja* dog.
results.enhanced_description: This black ninja dog once served the Hingan kunoichi Yozakura. As compassionate as he is loyal, he refused to forsake his mistress even after she had turned into an abomination, and chooses to travel with you as part of a pilgrimage dedicated to her soul.
results.tooltip: Nothing short of death will cause a shinobi to forsake his mission.    - Oboro

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 70%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Shiromaru
results.description: Summon your Shiromaru minion. Because the only thing that's better than a dog is a *ninja* dog.
results.enhanced_description: This white ninja dog once served the Hingan kunoichi Yozakura. Driven by a keen sense of duty, he decided to follow you in gratitude for laying his mistress's soul to rest. Written upon the scroll he carries is an ancient ninjutsu technique for parting people from their treats.
results.tooltip: Shinobi are trained to put duty ahead of all else.    - Oboro

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **critter**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Okuri Chochin
results.description: Summon your okuri chochin minion. For those who like a little fright with their light.
results.enhanced_description: This small lantern ghost found in Mount Rokkon was born when a child's well-loved paper lantern came to harbor a spirit. Possessed of a friendly nature, it happily follows its master everywhere rather than misleading hapless souls in the dark as its kind are wont to do.
results.tooltip: You are the light that guidesss us, comrade. As such, I would have you prepare the lampsss we use for night patrol.    - Eshana

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all enemies within range while increasing action party ATK by 20.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Goggle-eyed Dogu
results.description: Summon your goggle-eyed dogu minion. Guaranteed to win any staring contest.
results.enhanced_description: Retrieved from the bottom of the sea, this mysterious clay figurine is entirely hollow and moves by means of magic. While scholars believe that it was used in some manner of ritual during the Second Astral Era, others such as Delion of *The Thavnairian Truth* fame are convinced it was made in the image of an alien.
results.tooltip: Who would have thought that the answer to our prayers would be found in ancient pottery of all places?    - Zlatan

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - The Lilac Sea 2, Wingsreach

verminion.skill_description:
Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eyeimpervious to damage.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Wind-up Athena
results.description: Summon your wind-up Athena minion. To follow you everywhere─*that* is her wish.
results.enhanced_description: Boasting the likeness of Athena, the first chief keyward of Pandæmonium, this automaton was created in secret by a colleague who greatly admired her. That colleague later vanished without a trace, some days after which a peculiar dog with a man's face is said to have appeared in the facility.
results.tooltip: Athena must be the sole focus of your attention.    - Lahabrea

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, reduces the movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 20s
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Barbariccia
results.description: Summon your wind-up Barbariccia minion. Will blow you away─figuratively.
results.enhanced_description: Assuming the likeness of Barbariccia, one of Golbez's four archfiends, this automaton was made according to a blueprint devised by a goldsmith who chanced to witness her. Wishing to share the voidsent queen's unique beauty with others, the artisan focused on capturing her flowing hair and savage grace.
results.tooltip: B-Barbariccia... She is come!    - Ciriatto

verminion.skill_description: Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

results.name: Rubellite Weapon
results.description: Summon your Rubellite Weapon minion. Scaled down or no, it can scratch you up good.
results.enhanced_description: Retrieved from an imperial base, this scale prototype of a warmachina appears to have been created for aerodynamics testing and carries no armaments. After completing their analysis, the Eorzean Alliance saw fit to bestow it upon members as a reward for exemplary service.
results.tooltip: Feast your eyes on the likeness of the Crimson Conqueror, the Vermilion Villain, the Scarlet...Scoundrel, the one and only Ruby Weapon!    - Warmachina Fanatic

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 40.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Puffin
results.description: Summon your puffin minion. Wants to work smarter, not harder.
results.enhanced_description: Native to the northern seas, this seabird is distinguishable by its orange bill and feet. It swims effectively using its short wings in lieu of fins, and can catch several fish in a single dive. Having witnessed you vanquish fiends with ease, however, this creature decided to follow you in hopes of leading a comfortable life.
results.tooltip: Adventurers, you see, are as migratory birds in need of a place to rest their weary wings.   - Antoinaut

verminion.skill_description:
Grants action party the ability to deal extra damage to Arcana Stones.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Mossasaurus
results.description: Summon your mossasaurus minion. It's adorable now, but wait till it grows up.
results.enhanced_description: Encountered in distant seas, this dinosaur young belongs to a species named for its unhurried disposition. Though the creature may look adorable, it will one day grow to be a monstrous predator. Even now it is on the lookout for potential prey, which thankfully does not include you. Yet.
results.tooltip: Your eyes are starting to have the sharpness of a predator about them.    - Hamon

sources.text: Near, Far, Wherever Fish Are II

verminion.skill_description:
Increases caster ATK by 10 and DEF by 5 for every 5% of HP lost.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Posher Otter
results.description: Summon your posher otter minion. Part futuristic, part antiquated, all class.
results.enhanced_description: Believed to hail from the Far East, this otter was fishing out in the open sea when its boat capsized. Though it managed to find its way to a desert island, it was used as a test subject by automata and made to wear steam-powered wings and dapper attire.
results.tooltip: Speaking of steam, I think I feel some coming out my ears.    - Regitt

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack 5 times the potency of the caster's ATK.

results.name: Chimpanzee
results.description: This adorable critter will make you love every ape that you see, from chimpan-a to chimpan-z. Summon your chimpanzee minion.
results.enhanced_description: A highly intelligent species of ape, the chimpanzee can be trained to use tools as well as simple language. Some naturalists believe them to be close relatives to mankind, but none have been able to determine an evolutionary process.
results.tooltip: May the fortune of the monkey attend you!    - Saru Bugyo

verminion.skill_description: Triggers an enemy trap as if it were your own. If the trap deals physical damage, then potency is increased by 150%.

results.name: Mikra Lyssa
results.description: Summon your mikra Lyssa minion. Definitely meant to be a wolf─the ancients said so.
results.enhanced_description: Made in the likeness of the bipedal wolf Lyssa, this automaton was apparently used to test the creation's viability at smaller proportions. While it is skilled at various striking and grappling techniques, the effect is commensurate with its diminutive size.
results.tooltip: Give us a hand and we'll get out of your hair. Wolf's honor.    - The Wolf Burglar

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 90%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

results.name: Exciting Dynamite
results.description: Summon your exciting dynamite minion. For those who love the threat of death or serious injury to follow their every step.
results.enhanced_description: While this dynamite young is determined to do what it was born to do─detonate spectacularly and engulf all in a fiery conflagration─it is thankfully some ways away from accomplishing the deed. According to Thrillingway, there is no thrill quite like using it in place of a pillow when sleeping.
results.tooltip: Take care you are not caught in blassst. I would be upssset to lose a helpful adventurer sssuch as you.    - Eshana

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

results.name: Findingway
results.description: Summon your Findingway minion. Can find his own way without you, but chooses to tag along.
results.enhanced_description: Diminutive even among his brethren, this Loporrit was the last to awaken from his eons-long slumber. Although his mission was to survey the land, it has become his foremost passion to make new discoveries, and he shares the accounts of his journeys with everyone on the moon.
results.tooltip: There's a whole world out there to explore!    - Shaggles

sources.text: Coiningway - Hoper's Hold (Mare Lamentorum) - 8 Loporrit Carats (Rank 5)

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

results.name: Private Pachypodium
results.description: Summon your private pachypodium minion. Its detonating days are thankfully over.
results.enhanced_description: Underling to Gancanagh, this pachypodium mine had hidden itself for an ambush, but it burrowed too deep into the ground and missed its chance to detonate. Subsequently released from military service, it appears to be enjoying its newfound freedom.
results.tooltip: Take care you are not caught in blassst.    - Eshana

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Search Eye by 90%. No effect if Search Eye is already inoperable.

results.name: Mama Automaton
results.description: Summon your Mama automaton minion. Mama knows best. Listen to Mama.
results.enhanced_description: This diminutive automaton was in the possession of the wandering minstrel. It is said to be modeled after a mysterious creature called Mama, who guided a lone girl while pursuing thousands of stories and millions of dreams. Or something.
results.tooltip: You okay? Sure you're not going overboard?    - Mama

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Bantam Train
results.description: Summon your bantam train minion. It choo-choo-chooses to haunt you.
results.enhanced_description: This model train was assembled from mysterious parts salvaged from the bottom of the sea. Who it was meant to carry is unknown, but it is somehow tinged with a phantasmal air. Curiously, despite having no mechanism for self-propulsion, it tirelessly chugs along after you.
results.tooltip: Allow me to perform a locomotive experiment with this body shape.    - Envious Ea

sources.text: Crafted by Armorer - Subaquatic Voyages: Sirensong Sea 5, Bellflower Flood

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Philos
results.description: Summon your wind-up philos minion. By the by...you see it too, yes?
results.enhanced_description: There once was a man who shouldered a heavy responsibility in the capital of the star. In spite of this, he bore a name that made light of himself, and delighted in the simple things with his cherished friends. This mammet was made in his honor.
results.tooltip: Believe, and walk in faith. Let the light of your soul shine for all to see.    - Loyal Friend

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Wind-up Aidoneus
results.description: Summon your wind-up Aidoneus minion. If sighs could kill, you'd be dead a thousand times over.
results.enhanced_description: There once was a man whose ability to see and channel aether was unrivaled. With his singular talent, he kept watch over the Underworld, the place whereto all departed souls return, and solemnly served the star. This mammet was made in his honor.
results.tooltip: My ideals are inviolate. Invincible.    - Unwavering Ancient

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **poppets** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Wind-up Godbert
results.description: Summon your wind-up Godbert minion. No less gentlemanly for its compact size, this mammet stands ever ready to do what only a Manderville can.
results.enhanced_description: Godbert Manderville, the realm's greatest goldsmith and distinguished proprietor of the Gold Saucer, created this automaton in his own likeness to serve as a prize for the Make It Rain event. It is guaranteed to enhance the gentlemanliness of anyone it accompanies.
results.tooltip: Splendidly suplexed, Lord Godbert!    - Nashu Mhakaracca

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

results.name: Wind-up Cagnazzo
results.description: Summon your wind-up Cagnazzo minion. The puddles and ponds are his to command.
results.enhanced_description: In his single-minded pursuit of mighty foes, Cagnazzo tasked one of his minions with creating a being in his likeness. The result was this automaton, which, needless to say, disappointed the archfiend of water. Its maker was never seen again.
results.tooltip: You'd best not disappoint!    - Cagnazzo

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **poppets**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Suzusaurus
results.description: Summon your suzusaurus minion. Might be able to tow a rowboat to safety if not a galleon.
results.enhanced_description: Believed to be related to the legendary elasmosaurus, this young sea dragon had become separated from its herd when it encountered a submersible, which it decided to follow. Inquisitive by nature, it cranes its long neck to scout out its surroundings, and will not stray from whomever it considers its parent.
results.tooltip: I have a feeling everything is going to go swimmingly!    - T'laqa Tia

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Bloodbreak, The Lilac Sea 2

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
 **Duration:** 6s

results.name: Corgi
results.description: Summon your corgi minion. Fluffy, full of beans, and fit for a queen.
results.enhanced_description: A type of herding dog known for its short legs, the corgi is the result of breeding squat specimens that could avoid the hooves of livestock. In the old tongue of the northern seas, the name means “dwarf dog,” which, aside from the literal meaning, is a reference to a folktale that claims the creatures were once ridden by Lalafells.
results.tooltip: As if I would trail along behind you...like some sniveling lapdog...    - Nero tol Scaeva

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Wind-up Halone
results.description: Summon your wind-up Halone minion. For those who like it icy cold.
results.enhanced_description: While traveling through the snow in search of awe-inspiring beauty, a goldsmith inadvertently wandered into the phantom realm. Though unsure if the cold had addled his mind, he later crafted this automaton based on the woman he glimpsed within, imbuing it with her imposing grace.
results.tooltip: You must do better than that against me!    - Halone

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

results.name: Sky Blue Back
results.description: Born in the Cieldalaes. It was born in the Cieldalaes. It was born in the Cieldalaes. Born in the Cieldalaes. Summon your sky blue back minion.
results.enhanced_description: Hatched on an isle of the Cieldalaes, this young blue back was originally intended to be kept as livestock, but an excess of chicks led to it being rehomed. On account of belonging to a flightless species, it has a penchant for going on adventures off the island.
results.tooltip: Stickin' yer beak into me business again?    - Blanstyr

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Sewer Skink
results.description: Summon your sewer skink minion. When it comes to keeping aqueducts free of creepy-crawlies, this lightning-tongued lizard is the hero of the day.
results.enhanced_description: Found dwelling deep in the Sil'dihn waterways, these skinks keep the stones clear of both mold and vilekin alike with quick lashes of their long, blue tongues─a service considered more valuable than that provided by any Sil'dihn royal guard's patrol.
results.tooltip: Why, I'd rather hire a sewer rat to mind my larder!    - Milala

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **critters** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Sponge Silkie
results.description: Summon your sponge silkie minion. This palm-sized cleaning familiar's only purpose is to scrub things until they shine─tabletops, armor, ear canals, you name it.
results.enhanced_description: Subordinate to the larger sanitation familiar left behind in the Sil'dihn Subterrane, the sponge silkie is able to summon a soapy cleaning agent from thin air. It will squeeze its malleable body into the smallest crevices and expunge every last spot of filth and dirt, continuing the work it once did in the royal palace.
results.tooltip: I am a finder of filth and a pursuer of purity.    - Statuesque Broom

verminion.skill_description:
Renders the action party immune to all attacks by **poppets**.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Lumini
results.description: Summon your lumini minion. This floating ball of fleshy horror was modeled after an Ea who failed to regain full corporeality.
results.enhanced_description: A Stigma-4 product, manufactured as a warning for those Ea who might rush into attaining a fleshly vessel before properly recalling the shape of their corporeal form. For those yearning to experience the taste of ice cream, however, the reward may be worth the risks...
results.tooltip: Oh, what I would not give to don proper fleshy raiments once more before I pass into the void!    - Envious Ea

sources.text: N-0598 - A-4 Research (Ultima Thule) - 8 Omicron Omnitokens (Rank 5)

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Clockwork Cerulean Chaser
results.description: Summon your clockwork cerulean chaser minion. Painted a stylish shade of blue, this miniature machina is a scale replica of the full-size model deployed in military training exercises.
results.enhanced_description: An Ironworks machina enthusiast has replicated the Astragalos cruise chaser in tiny, toylike form. Originally intended for a wider market, a refusal to compromise on the inclusion of a transformation function led to exorbitant production costs and a repurposing to allied training trophy.
results.tooltip: It's the support of fans such as yourself that make this such a worthwhile hobby.    - Warmachina Fanatic

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%. 
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Clockwork Crimson Chaser
results.description: Summon your clockwork crimson chaser minion. Painted a sleek shade of red, this miniature machina is a scale replica of the full-size model deployed in military training exercises.
results.enhanced_description: An Ironworks machina enthusiast has replicated the Astragalos cruise chaser in tiny, toylike form. Originally intended for a wider market, a refusal to compromise on the inclusion of a transformation function led to exorbitant production costs and a repurposing to allied training trophy.
results.tooltip: Ah, there I go, getting carried away as usual!    - Warmachina Fanatic

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%. 
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Felicitous Fuzzball
results.description: Summon your felicitous fuzzball minion. Its presence is your present, and that's all the effort you're getting from this indolent island mammet.
results.enhanced_description: The latest model in Sharlayan automata, developed for island sanctuary labor. According to the research, one out of every five worker ants doesn't actually work, and thus came about the development of this chore-shirking mammet hooded in fur-lined, feline apathy. After all, statistics don't lie, and someone has to fill the slacker quotient.
results.tooltip: Ba Go knew someone would be shirking─dodging, malingering, shirking.    - Acolyte Ba Go

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

results.name: Wind-up Erichthonios
results.description: Summon your wind-up Erichthonios minion. He'll get them all out. He must.
results.enhanced_description: This mammet depicting Erichthonios, a warder of Pandæmonium, was crafted in secret by a colleague impressed by his unyielding sense of duty. When one's workplace is overrun by the most violent manifestations of creation magicks, clutching tight to such a doll must keep the spark of hope alive.
results.tooltip: I-I'll save them! I...must...    - Erichthonios

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

results.name: Clockwork Solus
results.description: Summon your clockwork Solus minion. No lands must remain beyond its grasp. Go forth. Conquer. Rule.
results.enhanced_description: Designed in the likeness of Solus zos Galvus, founding father of the Garlean Empire, this automaton was created in the royal workshops to commemorate the ninth anniversary of his ascension. Several units were dispatched to the provinces as a show of the nation's technological prowess.
results.tooltip: I should be the one to sigh.    - Solus zos Galvus

verminion.skill_description: Transports action party to the central summoning Gate.

results.name: Wind-up Scarmiglione
results.description: Summon your wind-up Scarmiglione minion. Is that hooded gaze regarding you with affection or insatiable hunger? Hard to tell.
results.enhanced_description: The archfiend of earth commanded this likeness of himself be crafted that it might keep his underlings in a state of terrified subjugation. Needless to say, when this stunted and strangely adorable homunculus was unveiled, its creator was promptly devoured.
results.tooltip: Hissssss... Your aether is mine!    - Scarmiglione

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Pterosquirrel
results.description: Summon your pterosquirrel minion. Despite its chubby appearance, this bright-eyed companion can glide a surprising distance.
results.enhanced_description: A relative of the more common ground squirrel, the pterosquirrel can comfortably glide up to forty yalms through the air thanks to the membranes of skin attached between foreleg and hind limb. Useful for escaping predators or landing on unsuspecting faces.
results.tooltip: Seven hells, did those accursed squirrels leave any part of me untouched?    - Arold

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **monsters**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Arkasodara
results.description: Summon your wind-up Arkasodara minion. Comes with modesty covered.
results.enhanced_description: The Hippo Riders turned to the Great Work to create these mammets as gifts for their patrons. Garbed in a traditional Thavnairian outfit, it boasts appeal as a local souvenir, and the redoubtable merchants of Yedlihmad are eyeing ways to profit from them.
results.tooltip: Never have I felt so invigorated, to have such a mighty Arkasodara fighting by my side!    - Ogul

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Wind-up Ragnarok
results.description: Summon your wind-up *Ragnarok* minion. Loporrit crew not included, delightful though that would be.
results.enhanced_description: A scale model of the *Ragnarok*, the starship born of the blood, sweat, and tears of countless souls. From the bridge to the propulsion system, every part has been faithfully recreated in celebration of the original. And like the original, it ran its creators ragged from overwork.
results.tooltip: *Ragnarok*, engage!    - Alphinaud

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Resurrection -Among The Stars- Artbook

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Clockwork Novus D
results.description: Summon your clockwork Novus D minion. Deftly driven by an unspecified (but doubtless incomparably brilliant) man.
results.enhanced_description: Modeled upon the popular magitek passenger vehicle Novus D, this tin toy is a favorite of Garlean children, who never tire of winding it up and watching it rattle along. A certain master engineer is said to have created it for both profit and pleasure.
results.tooltip: I must settle for crushing the ironmen's toys.    - Sadu

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Teacup Kapikulu
results.description: Summon your teacup Kapikulu minion. Small but eager to work.
results.enhanced_description: Though charged with the Kapikulu's maintenance in the depths of Alzadaal's Legacy, this mammet was largely idle. When trespassers finally appeared in the vault, it dared to hope that it could make itself useful again, but the Kapikulu's demise led to its unemployment.
results.tooltip: I was deep in my teacups at the time, but I know what I saw!    - Pungent Namazu

verminion.skill_description:
Renders action party immune to all attacks.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Protonaught
results.description: Summon your protonaught minion. The amount it can lift would put a full-grown Roegadyn to shame.
results.enhanced_description: A miniaturized version of an Allagan construction machina, believed to have been created as a test prototype. Like the full-sized production models, it is remarkably strong relative to its proportions and can carry far more than its own weight.
results.tooltip: Bigger is not necessarily better.    - Man with a Familiar Voice

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Blue-footed Booby
results.description: Summon your blue-footed booby minion. A terror from beak to tailfeather.
results.enhanced_description: Formerly of Mistbeard's dread band, this merciless seabird was known for disarming its victims with its vacant gaze before pecking them into submission. But that's all in the past, and it has long since retired to a quiet life hopping between the isles of the southern seas.
results.tooltip: I heard some sky pirates go so far as to booby-trap their coffers.    - Lyolf

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

results.name: Chewy
results.description: Summon your Chewy minion. Take care not to drown in its literal puppy dog eyes.
results.enhanced_description: A small breed of dog native to the New World, this adorable critter was brought over to Eorzea by Lominsan sailors. Inquisitive and enthusiastic, it stands ever ready to embark on an adventure with you...but never says no to a spot of frolicking.
results.tooltip: From a hound at his throat to a puppy at his heel...    - Hien

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Wind-up Kangaroo
results.description: Summon your wind-up kangaroo minion. Always has a spring in its step.
results.enhanced_description: This lifelike doll of a marsupial native to the southern continent of Meracydia was discovered by your retainer in an abandoned quarry village. The joey in its pouch seldom shows itself, but this is apparently all according to design.
results.tooltip: I have faith that you'll bounce back.    - Hamon Holyfist

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 70%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Azeyma
results.description: Summon your wind-up Azeyma minion. For those who like it scorching hot.
results.enhanced_description: While traveling through the desert in search of divine beauty, a goldsmith inadvertently wandered into the phantom realm. Though unsure if he was dreaming, he later crafted this automaton based on the woman he glimpsed within, imbuing it with her fiery grace.
results.tooltip: Let the fires rage!    - Azeyma

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Hatching Bunny
results.description: Summon your hatching bunny minion. If happiness had form, it would look like this.
results.enhanced_description: A mammet inspired by the peculiar rabbits in Jihli Aliapoh's vision. Initially missing a core, it sprung to life by the power of the crystal brought by an actual happy bunny, and will surely lead its owner to good fortune. Probably.
results.tooltip: While I'm more of a “cat-lover,” variety is, after all, the spice of life!    - Gegeruju

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

results.name: Royal Lunatender
results.description: Summon your royal lunatender minion. All that glitters is not gold. It could also be a lunatender.
results.enhanced_description: A mutation caused this lunatender to be golden in color─a trait which, while accentuating its royal lineage, rendered it easy prey on the moon's grey surface. Seeking a less harrowing life, it chose instead to become an Excitatron prize.
results.tooltip: The way she spoke, you'd think she was bloody royalty or something...    - Wiscar

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Nosferatu
results.description: Summon your nosferatu minion. Nothing if not gentlemanly...and perhaps bloodthirsty.
results.enhanced_description: Though understood to refer to vampires, the word “nosferatu” has an uncertain origin, and the same may be said of this bat-like creature. However, from the fact that it appears to be wearing a dinner suit and won't drink your blood without permission, it is clearly a gentlemanly sort.
results.tooltip: Aren't bats just the cutest little plague-bearers you ever did see?    - Bat Enthusiast

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

results.name: Wind-up Porom
results.description: Summon forth your wind-up Porom minion. The rosy cheeks and pronounced eyelashes indicate that this is the female half of a matching pair.
results.enhanced_description: Created in the likeness of Porom, twin sister to Palom. According to legend, they were sent by the elder of their village to aid in an epic quest to save the world, which seems like a bit of a tall order for two five-year olds. Perhaps the other mages had more important matters to take care of?
results.tooltip: This isn't a picnic we're going on, Palom.    - Porom

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Adventure Basket
results.description: Summon your adventure basket minion. Because no one should have to save the world on an empty stomach.
results.enhanced_description: Be it a frozen waste or a volcano's fiery bowels, no matter where your adventures take you, this basket laden with tasty morsels will nourish your body while lifting your spirit. Cutlery and crockery included for your consuming convenience.
results.tooltip: This is a picnic compared to my officer training...    - Dancing Wolf

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Golden Dhyata
results.description: Summon your Golden Dhyata minion. Is it a bird? Is it a fish? No, it's a translation device!
results.enhanced_description: A faithful replica of the artifact being studied by Professor Rurusha, this translation device is believed to have been created in the likeness of a catfish. However, none can say why the ancients chose such a whimsical form for it.
results.tooltip: Something lost in translation, perhaps?    - Jenomis

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Optimus Omicron
results.description: Summon your optimus Omicron minion. Minimum proportions, maximum performance.
results.enhanced_description: As part of an initiative to downsize themselves, the Omicrons created this miniaturized, full-featured unit as a test prototype. Alas, the siege matrix Stigma-4 ceased to function shortly thereafter, and it never reached the mass production stage.
results.tooltip: I prefer foes to be more compact like myself─tiny, puny, compact.    - 269th Order Mendicant Da Za

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **monster**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Starbird
results.description: Summon your starbird minion. Gazing up at the stars in the heavens, it ever sings a song of hope.
results.enhanced_description: A beautiful blue bird whose features are reminiscent of the starfaring creation Meteion. So long as hope abides in its master's heart, never shall its plumage take on the black of despair.
results.tooltip: Birds of a feather are we!    - X'rhun Tia

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

results.name: Wind-up Vrtra
results.description: Summon your wind-up Vrtra minion. Last of his brood but certainly not least.
results.enhanced_description: A mammet designed in the likeness of the great wyrm Vrtra, who is said to be possessed of a gentle heart despite his fearsome appearance. Though this recreation is somewhat less fearsome than the actual wyrm, it is not for want of effort on its part.
results.tooltip: The hour is come, Vrtra.    - Estinien

sources.text: Item code included with Endwalker Original Soundtrack

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Herois
results.description: Summon your wind-up herois minion. Come on, you know who this hero is.
results.enhanced_description: There once was a woman who selflessly served her fellow man as Azem. Even after stepping down, she continued in this mission, and went on to become a divinity that hope may endure. This mammet was made in her honor.
results.tooltip: 'Tis time for action.    - Ancient Hero

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Brave New Urianger
results.description: Summon your brave new Urianger minion. Despite its diminutive size, its arms are no less weapons than those of the man himself.
results.enhanced_description: While tidying up the solar at the Rising Stones, Tataru discovered a veritable army of wind-up Uriangers─the result of a misorder. Resourceful as ever, the Scions' coinkeeper altered their hair and attire, and marketed them as a limited edition model.
results.tooltip: What thinkest thou... of mine appearance?    - Urianger

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

results.name: Wind-up Grebuloff
results.description: Summon your wind-up Grebuloff minion. Smells vaguely like a rocky shore.
results.enhanced_description: One day, a Namazu craftsman was swept away in the One River. As he tumbled along the riverbed, he had a vision of a mysterious being, which he recreated in the form of this mammet. Or so your retainer reports. Could such a life-form exist somewhere out there?
results.tooltip: So you think yourself an adept enough diver to brave the depths of the sea?    - Ajiro

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Caduceus
results.description: Summon your Caduceus minion. Won't spit acid at you, so rest easy.
results.enhanced_description: One of Hermes's pet creations, this intelligent serpent served as a message-bearer in Elpis. Perhaps due to his inherited memories, Amon would bestow the selfsame name upon another serpentine creation, which he dispatched to guard Dalamud.
results.tooltip: My money is on writhing snakes.    - Thancred

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 40%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Crabe De La Crabe
results.description: Summon your crabe de la crabe minion. If it were any crabbier, it would...probably still be a crab.
results.enhanced_description: Native to Thavnair, this tree-dwelling crab became known to foreign scholars when an Arkasodara clan pointed them out to a visiting crew. So exemplarily crab-like were its features, it was promptly identified as such and given a name to match.
results.tooltip: If yer playin' us false, I'll be back to feed the crabs with yer lyin' tongue.    - Rostnsthal

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **monsters**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Hippo Calf
results.description: Summon your hippo calf minion. Heavy. Assisted lift may be required.
results.enhanced_description: Hippopotami are native to Meracydia, and scholars point to their presence in Thavnair as proof that trade thrived between the lands long ago. During the chaos of the Final Days, this calf became separated from its herd and strayed into your path in Vanaspati.
results.tooltip: Thou shalt not lift with thy back.    - Ancient Wisdom

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Nagxian Cat
results.description: Summon your Nagxian cat minion. The very soul of grace and nobility, and can see souls to boot.
results.enhanced_description: In former times in Nagxia, the breeding of this graceful and noble cat was permitted only to royalty and high priests. Yet it was not only for these traits that it was coveted; legend holds that its blue eyes can discern the aether of all things, including departed souls.
results.tooltip: I've never beheld such grace, such elegance, such... unfathomable beauty!    - Stricken Traveler

sources.text: J'lakshai (Old Sharlayan) / Wilmetta (Radz-at-Han) - 800 Sacks of Nuts

verminion.skill_description: Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

results.name: Flag
results.description: Summon your Flag minion. A little reindeer with a huge appetite.
results.enhanced_description: So named for its fluttering tail, this adorable reindeer calf boasts a prodigious appetite that belies its size. Especially partial to corn, it threatened to devour clean a farmer's entire harvest, forcing the man to beg your retainer to take it away.
results.tooltip: I'm in no mood to be fawned over.    - Greinfarr

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **critter**).

results.name: Squirrel Emperor
results.description: Summon your squirrel emperor minion. At once more powerful and adorable than a certain simian king.
results.enhanced_description: Fond of mortal children, the auspice Rissai once transformed himself into a learned man and taught the young ones their letters. Like the real auspice, this self-created avatar goes wherever the winds of philanthropy and delicious sweets blow.
results.tooltip: Thanks to predation by other rodents, only the fittest and most vicious of squirrels survive to adulthood.    - Hunter-scholar

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 180 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Anima
results.description: Summon your wind-up Anima minion. Warning: cannot be used to teleport or upgrade weapons.
results.enhanced_description: In old Garlean, the word “anima” means “soul,” though some philosophers have come to use it to refer to the hidden feminine side of men. Whether this explains why Anima's lower head appears feminine is debatable, but one thing is certain: no shins are safe from this mammet's fists of fury.
results.tooltip: Distract me with your feminine wiles, and then strike when my guard is down?    - Carvallain

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Magus Sisters
results.description: Summon your wind-up Magus Sisters minion. Essentially three minions for one, so it represents great value.
results.enhanced_description: The Magus Sisters are revered deities in Thavnair, and their images are popularly peddled in Radz-at-Han as talismans. Able to move about freely and perform impressive acrobatics, this set of the three divinities counts among the more premium offerings.
results.tooltip: All right, teamwork!    - Medrod

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Wind-up Daivadipa
results.description: Summon your wind-up Daivadipa minion. Can discern good and evil─so long as they are at knee height.
results.enhanced_description: A mechanical image of Daivadipa, one of the Mrga traditionally worshipped in Thavnair. In the old tongue of the Arkasodara, his name means “heavenly light” or simply “eye”─a reference to his ability to discern good and evil.
results.tooltip: Naught will escape my all-seeing eyes, no, no.    - Gyoka

sources.text: Nesvaaz - Radz-at-Han - 5 Daivadipa's Beads (FATE "Devout Pilgrims vs. Daivadipa" - Thavnair)

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 10.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Greener Gleaner
results.description: Summon your greener gleaner minion. Good at hiding, but clearly not good enough.
results.enhanced_description: Though genomos are adept at hiding among foliage, this young specimen couldn't escape your retainer's keen eyes. Due to their predilection for small insects, Sharlayans have long bred the creatures to keep pests under control.
results.tooltip: Waiting is boring, like watching moss grow on rocks.    - Vanu Scout

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Tiny Troll
results.description: Summon your tiny troll minion. The good kind that makes constructive, well-thought-out comments.
results.enhanced_description: Originally an inhabitant of Labyrinthos, this inquisitive young troll snuck into the Aitiascope, where it fell into the aetherial sea. There it met the souls of its ancestors─an experience that saw it mature beyond its tender years.
results.tooltip: I swear he's part forest troll...    - Lightly Built Lab Assistant

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **monsters** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Prince Lunatender
results.description: Summon your Prince Lunatender minion. Use as a decoration at risk of suffering puncture wounds─lots of them.
results.enhanced_description: As part of their efforts to make Smileton into a paradise, the Loporrits caught this prince among lunatenders to use as an ornamental plant. However, it was disinclined to suffer the indignity, and slipped into your bag and fled.
results.tooltip: This is sure to fetch a princely sum from Master Gegeruju!    - Zhloe Aliapoh

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Wee Ea
results.description: Summon your wee Ea minion. Proof that you don't need to be big to think big.
results.enhanced_description: In order to rearrange their jumbled thoughts, the Ea are known to temporarily shed a small part of themselves. In this instance, however, said part took on a will of its own and embarked on a journey of contemplation.
results.tooltip: My, how thoughtful!    - Cirina

sources.text: N-1499 - Base Omicron (Ultima Thule) - 500 Bicolor Gemstones (Rank 3)

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Wind-up Rudy
results.description: Summon your Rudy minion. Eager to help, though perhaps not suited to guiding sleighs.
results.enhanced_description: Having served dutifully as one of the saint's little helpers, Rudy returned to his home deep in the mountains. But thanks to a Starlight miracle, a wandering saint succeeded in recreating a minion of the fellow so lifelike, it breathes.
results.tooltip: Why, it's a Starlight miracle!    - Amh Garanjy

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Gunnhildr
results.description: Summon your wind-up Gunnhildr minion. Protects her people as a queen, a god, and now a mammet.
results.enhanced_description: Created in the likeness of Queen Gunnhildr, this mammet was found clutching a slip of paper bearing the words: “At journey's end, I discovered a new love...only to have it vanish with the ephemeral light.” In its mannerism, one cannot help but sense something familiar...
results.tooltip: The will of Queen Gunnhildr shall not be denied.    - Misija

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, reduces the movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 20s
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: 9S Automaton
results.description: Summon your 9S automaton minion. For when you need the company of a compact version of an advanced combat android dressed in a distinctive subculture style.
results.enhanced_description: Recovered from the upper levels of the Tower, this diminutive automaton bears a resemblance to the android known as YoRHa No.9 Type S. What thoughts drove him and his kind, and to what end did they risk all in their fight? The answers to such questions may never be found...
results.tooltip: Not a boy, an android.    - 2P

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all enemies within range while increasing action party ATK by 20.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Smaller Stubby
results.description: Summon your smaller stubby minion. A little rusted but still fit for purpose...whatever that may be.
results.enhanced_description: Discovered on the upper levels of the Tower, this tiny lifeform resembles the short-legged machines that occupied the selfsame structure. Though it follows you relentlessly, scans the area menacingly, and punches vigorously, it appears to mean you no harm.
results.tooltip: Nothing but lumps of rust if you ask me.    - Moogle

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Rosa
results.description: Summon forth your wind-up Rosa minion. Based on the central corner of a one-sided love triangle, if such a thing is possible.
results.enhanced_description: Rosa is said to have been blessed with both powerful healing abilities and an unerring bow arm. Unfortunately, these were of little use on the occasion she came close to being either sliced by a guillotine or crushed by an iron ball, depending on which version of the tale one hears...
results.tooltip: Please, Cecil...Be alive!    - Rosa

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

results.name: Wind-up Rydia
results.description: Summon forth your wind-up Rydia minion. Not to be confused with a sprig of broccoli.
results.enhanced_description: According to myth, Rydia went missing as a child only to reemerge a short while later as a woman grown. How she later came to be immortalized as a miniaturized mammet is unclear, though her voluminous bright green hair is said to be very true to life.
results.tooltip: That was an awfully fast recovery.    - Rydia

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

results.name: Wind-up Edge
results.description: Summon forth your wind-up Edge minion. Based on one of the few people who had the chance to be a prince *and* a ninja, which seems like too much fun to squeeze into one lifetime.
results.enhanced_description: Legends tell of Edward Geraldine, the ninja prince who assumed the name Edge, presumably because it sounded more impressive. Rumors have it that “Edward” was already taken by another figure in the tale, and there cannot be two people sharing the same name─it just gets confusing.
results.tooltip: You think our rage...a weakness? Then let me show you how wrong you are!    - Edge

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Palom
results.description: Summon forth your wind-up Palom minion. Try not to break it.
results.enhanced_description: Based on one half of a pair of twin mages, this charming minion brings an air of mischief wherever it goes. The tales say that the real Palom mastered the dark arts by the age of five, though one has to question whether teaching dangerous magic to small children is such a good idea.
results.tooltip: Something stinks.    - Palom

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 20.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Wanderer's Campfire
results.description: Summon your wanderer's campfire minion. Perfect for driving away the darkness and the chill and, most importantly, toasting marshmallows.
results.enhanced_description: Couldn't strike a fire if your life depended on it? Sick of lugging around backbreaking loads of firewood on the off chance you need to camp out, but couldn't be bothered to gather the stuff at the end of a long, weary day? Introducing the wanderer's campfire!
results.tooltip: Few things compare to the simple pleasure of sitting beside a crackling campfire of one's own making.    - Alphinaud

verminion.skill_description: Restores 200 HP to all allies within range (250 if the ally is a **gadget**).

results.name: Benben Stone
results.description: Summon your Benben stone minion. For when you need the top stone of a pyramid scampering around after you.
results.enhanced_description: Long ago, the men of Meracydia built great stone monuments in the image of Benben, a mound of myth whose name means “eternity.” This object is the top piece of such a structure, but none can say how it came to be in the dark depths of a faraway sea─or why it has legs.
results.tooltip: Our legends will echo in eternity!    - Dorys

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - The Devil's Crypt, Magos Trench

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Magitek Predator F1
results.description: Summon your magitek predator F1 minion. Comes complete with pilot and stands ready to wreak havoc among the enemy's ranks.
results.enhanced_description: This miniaturized model of an imperial warmachina was found among the forces of the Telophoroi laying siege to Paglth'an. By all appearances a toy of Garlean make, it is unclear how it managed to make its way to the southern reaches of Eorzea.
results.tooltip: Smash and burn their little toy, we will!    - Ixali Chieftain

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Search Eye by 90%. No effect if Search Eye is already inoperable.

results.name: Wind-up Runar
results.description: Summon your wind-up Runar minion. Because a single Runar pining for Master Matoya isn't enough.
results.enhanced_description: Designed in the likeness of Runar, this mammet was created to celebrate the signing of a trade agreement between the Night's Blessed and the Crystarium. In its pocket is a single white blossom, that the man can express his undying devotion to his beloved even if he is a world away.
results.tooltip: Please, Runar, dry your tears. What would the others think if they saw you like this?    - Master Matoya

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Reflection -Histories Unwritten- Artbook

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Wind-up Lyna
results.description: Summon your wind-up Lyna minion. Don't forget to salute, or you're liable to receive a dressing-down.
results.enhanced_description: In her cups at the tavern one night, Lyna agreed to let a dwarven craftsman create mammets in her likeness. Though she claims no memory of the incident, it can't be denied that the result is a masterful recreation of the good captain, down to the rousing salute.
results.tooltip: Lyna does not strike me as one who enjoys being made to wait.    - Alphinaud

sources.text: Item code included with Death Unto Dawn Original Soundtrack

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Senorita Sabotender
results.description: Summon your Senorita Sabotender minion. Like a thousand adorable needles piercing your eyeballs.
results.enhanced_description: One of the coveted prizes on offer at the Gold Saucer, the Senorita Sabotender is the charming niece of the iconic Senor Sabotender. Each example is said to be lovingly handcrafted by the realm-renowned goldsmith and park proprietor, Godbert Manderville.
results.tooltip: Sabotenders do not shake!    - Nanaphon

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Gull
results.description: Summon your gull minion. Has a keen eye for finding schools of fish─and unguarded meals.
results.enhanced_description: In a quest to find more food with less effort, this La Noscean gull took to following the fishing vessel *Endeavor*. Its resourcefulness earned it the respect of the ship's captain and crew, and it was made an honorary member of the Fishermen's Guild.
results.tooltip: I swear, if another one takes a shite on my hair, it'll be seagull stew for dinner tonight!    - V'kebbe

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Dolphin Calf
results.description: Summon your dolphin calf minion. Has more intelligence in a single winsome flipper than you do in your whole body.
results.enhanced_description: A Sharlayan biologist once stated that dolphins are the second-most intelligent species on the star. It was later noted that, regarding the most intelligent, the man made no comment. Sensing impending doom, this calf has attached itself to you in hopes of finding a way to flee to safety.
results.tooltip: So long, and thanks for all the fish.    - Dolphinkind

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Anteater
results.description: Summon your anteater minion. Definitely not a man-eater, otherwise that's what it would be called...right?
results.enhanced_description: Thanks to its voracious appetite, this young anteater has grown to a size to rival an adult Lalafell. Though appearing to otherwise be harmless, in certain parts its kind is said to prey on seasonal workers─and the men specifically─thus earning it the moniker of the Widowmaker.
results.tooltip: I'll never find a wife at this rate.    - Gales

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Save The Princess
results.description: Summon your Save the Princess minion. For every person who has ever dreamed of owning a wheeled, spindly legged, trumpet-blowing mammet, there is this wheeled, spindly legged, trumpet-blowing mammet.
results.enhanced_description: Discovered deep in Delubrum Reginae, this bizarre contraption is believed to have been modeled after a much larger but equally bizarre contraption that once protected the ancient Bozjans from the Allagan Empire. The mystery of the trumpet, however, has yet to be solved.
results.tooltip: How is our little princess doing?    - Serendipity

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Trike
results.description: Summon your Trike minion. Very affectionate, but be prepared to make a quick sidestep if it comes running to greet you.
results.enhanced_description: Rescued from the Diadem by Aurvael de Haillenarte after falling sick from eating poisonous berries. The count's son would rather this tale not be discussed openly, particularly the part about him delving into a pile of fresh dung to ascertain the cause of the disease.
results.tooltip: That is one big pile of shite.    - Aurvael's Assistant

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

results.name: Syldrion-class Insubmersible
results.description: Summon your Syldrion-class insubmersible minion. Unlike the craft on which it is modeled, it will break immediately upon coming into contact with water.
results.enhanced_description: Despite being an incredibly realistic replica of a Syldra-class submersible, it lacks any such aquatic capabilities. It is, however, able to hover in midair for a seemingly limitless amount of time, which is considerably more impressive.
results.tooltip: I'll stick to swimming, thank you very much.    - Alisaie Leveilleur

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Sea of Jade 4, Wyrm's Rest, Seafoam Tide

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Gaia
results.description: Summon your wind-up Gaia minion. Those who think the hammer is just for show had best watch their toes.
results.enhanced_description: Supposedly discovered by those investigating the Empty, its appearance there is both inexplicable and implausible. Considering all the other unlikely events that occurred there, however, perhaps the sudden materialization of a hammer-wielding mammet is not so unusual after all.
results.tooltip: Let me get this straight. You came to talk to me about *biscuits*?    - Gaia

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 60%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

results.name: Golden Beaver
results.description: Summon your golden beaver minion. Remember: all that glitters is not gold. Sometimes, it is a beaver.
results.enhanced_description: Whether this creature is a beaver turned into gold, or gold turned into a beaver is anyone's guess. It is said to appear in the passages of Lyhe Ghiah at the very moment one's heart's desire is fulfilled. Given the location, that would generally involve some sort of treasure.
results.tooltip: No, anything but beavers!    - Tyr Beq

sources.text: The Shifting Oubliettes Of Lyhe Ghiah

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

results.name: Much-coveted Mora
results.description: Summon forth your much-coveted Mora minion. Few wavekin have ever been the object of so much anticipation, only to be followed by such crushing disappointment.
results.enhanced_description: The bane of many an ocean fisher, the Momora Mora exhibits all the qualities of much rarer and more desirable catches...until it is hoisted out of the water.
results.tooltip: Fishing's like philanderin'─ ye never know what ye'll catch!    - Wawalago Momolago

verminion.skill_description: Transports action party to the central summoning Gate.

results.name: Amaro Hatchling
results.description: Summon your amaro hatchling minion. It may make a fine steed if you live long enough to see it reach maturity.
results.enhanced_description: This infantile amaro's wings are not yet strong enough to lift it more than an ilm or so off the ground, try as it might. Given enough time around people, it may gain the gift of speech, but with you for a master, that process may be somewhat delayed...
results.tooltip: Oh, how I envy the amaro. In all of creation, no animal is so pure, so perfect...    - Bethric

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Drippy
results.description: Summon your Drippy minion. With a will to wander the world, one wonders whether said world will welcome this well-meaning watery whelp.
results.enhanced_description: This young nixie began life as rainwater that fell in Abalathia's Spine, and later found its way to Matoya's Relict via the Thaliak River. Having witnessed its elder kin summarily dispatched by the Warrior of Light, it decided to follow the age-old adage of “If one cannot beat them, one must needs join them.”
results.tooltip: Is this water!? Blah! Bluh! Bleh!    - A Bewildered Amalj'aa

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Dáinsleif F1
results.description: Summon your Dáinsleif F1 minion. Does not form the head. Or any other part of the body, for that matter.
results.enhanced_description: Following the success of the magitek avenger, imperial scientists looked to various other creatures for inspiration in designing their next warmachina, this feline automaton being the test model for their studies into quadrupedal carnivores.
results.tooltip: They're fierce carnivores, who see steel-clad knights as nothing more than a packed lunch.    - Alexondre

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Search Eye by 90%. No effect if Search Eye is already inoperable.

results.name: Magitek Helldiver F1
results.description: Summon your magitek helldiver F1 minion. Minimal firepower, maximum attitude.
results.enhanced_description: Although a single-rider flying machina like the sky armor, the helldiver is an entirely different beast to handle due to its fundamentally distinct design. Thus were such scale models produced, that would-be pilots might study their flight dynamics prior to taking the helm.
results.tooltip: Did that man just bring down flying armor with a single stroke *in midair*?    - Aymeric

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Petit Pteranodon
results.description: Summon your petit pteranodon minion. It might be cute now, but wait till it grows and becomes a scourge of the skies.
results.enhanced_description: Abandoned by its parents, this pteranodon young was discovered by an Ishgardian botanist during a foray on the Diadem. Though initially aloof, through regular hand-feeding it grew fond of people, and was placed in your care that it might become a worldly sort of prehistoric creature.
results.tooltip: When is a dinosaur not a dinosaur?    - Folk Riddle

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%. 
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Weatherproof Gaelicat
results.description: Summon your weatherproof gaelicat minion. Makes you feel toasty warm simply to behold it.
results.enhanced_description: It is theorized that the gaelicat's garb is no garb at all, but an extension of its corporeal form. That this specimen appears to be wearing a winter coat is the result of its adaptation to Coerthan climes, while its ample girth came about via a more mundane process: overeating.
results.tooltip: There is no creature so heavenly as the cat!    - Feline Fanatic

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 13%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: 2P Automaton
results.description: Summon your 2P automaton minion. For when you need the company of a compact version of an advanced combat android dressed in a distinctive subculture style.
results.enhanced_description: Though this automaton found within the Puppets' Bunker bears a resemblance to the android known as YoRHa No.2 Type P, it thankfully doesn't appear to be hostile. Created through unknown technology, how it operates is a complete mystery.
results.tooltip: Not that I'm not eager to take apart an android, but...how do we...do that?    - Konogg

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

results.name: 2B Automaton
results.description: Summon your 2B automaton minion. For when you need the company of a compact version of an advanced combat android dressed in a distinctive subculture style.
results.enhanced_description: Recovered from deep within the Puppets' Bunker, this diminutive automaton bears a resemblance to the android known as YoRHa No.2 Type B. Why such a thing was created and by whom, however, are questions that will likely remain unanswered.
results.tooltip: So there're androids, which are machines, but also other machines, and also...    - Dig Site Chief

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Damona
results.description: Summon your Damona minion. The daughter of an Oni pirate king.
results.enhanced_description: The daughter of an Oni pirate king. She is learned in the mystic arts but, as a trade-off, lacks emotion.
results.tooltip: The time has come.

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Zazel
results.description: Summon your Zazel minion. Counselor to generations of Enmas, the Yo-kai kings.
results.enhanced_description: Counselor to generations of Enmas, the Yo-kai kings. He repelled the corruption of the Overseer with the last Enma after he abdicated the throne.
results.tooltip: My lord!

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Lord Ananta
results.description: Summon your Lord Ananta minion. The new ruler of the Yo-kai World.
results.enhanced_description: The new ruler of the Yo-kai World. Once a rival of the now abdicated King Enma, he became a trusted ally and friend.
results.tooltip: Let us be off!

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

results.name: Lord Enma
results.description: Summon your Lord Enma minion. The last in a line of kings who guided the fate of the Yo-kai World.
results.enhanced_description: The last in a line of kings who guided the fate of the Yo-kai World. Within him dwell both the souls of a courageous young human boy and an all-powerful Yo-kai.
results.tooltip: Bring it on!

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Lalinator 5.H0
results.description: Summon your Lalinator 5.H0 minion. It doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And it absolutely will not stop, ever, until you have been lali-ho'd.
results.enhanced_description: Wishing to improve his lackluster lali-hoing, Ronitt created this automaton in secret to be his practice partner. Boasting precision movement and powered by dwarven ethanol, it performs rousing lali-hos the equal of any dwarf worth his ale.
results.tooltip: A “lali-ho” gets a “lali-ho,” you hear?    - Giott

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Allagan Melon
results.description: Summon your Allagan melon minion. Capable of movement and tremendously juicy.
results.enhanced_description: Since ancient times, melons have been favored in many cultures as nature's drinking flask. Not satisfied with merely their thirst-quenching property, however, Allagan scientists set out to make them portable, and this self-propelled melon is the fruit of their labors.
results.tooltip: And you say his muscles swelled to bursting, like firm melons ripening in the summer sun!?    - Company Muscle

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 270 to all enemies within range.
 **Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Ardbert
results.description: Summon your wind-up Ardbert minion. What he lacks in size, he makes up for in heart...and his disproportionately large axe.
results.enhanced_description: This mammet was created to honor Ardbert, the hero who fought to save the First as a Warrior of Light and Darkness both. His spirit lives on in all who has ever thought to lend a helping hand to his fellow man.
results.tooltip: As brightly as a hero's tale shines, it is not without its shadows.    - The Wandering Minstrel

verminion.skill_description:
Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eye impervious to damage.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Wind-up Mystel
results.description: Summon your wind-up Mystel minion. Modeled upon no one in particular. No, really.
results.enhanced_description: Desiring to honor a certain individual with a mammet likeness but knowing that it would go against his wishes to do so, the artisans of the Crystalline Mean came up with the perfect solution: make a mammet likeness anyway but give it a vague name. That makes everything all right...right?
results.tooltip: By any other name, I would still be a rose!    - Masked Rose

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Sand Fox
results.description: Summon your sand fox minion. Will perform tricks for a lick of birch syrup.
results.enhanced_description: The descendant of a thousand-year-old vulpine spirit, this creature dreamed of training under the tutelage of its legendary forebear, Sotan. Alas, it was turned away, and ended up taking you as its master instead. Though it will devour most anything you give it, it has grown fond of birch syrup.
results.tooltip: You can't smoke out a fox with hot air.    - Bran

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

results.name: Ephemeral Necromancer
results.description: Summon your ephemeral necromancer minion. If it could, it would summon forth an army of equally adorable undead.
