results.enhanced_description: As a token of gratitude for playing with them, a pixie created for you this miniature version of the spectral necromancer, the hero from a distant world whom you fought. Whoever that mysterious maiden may have been, her tale may never be known.
results.tooltip: If you go and die on me, I'll pay a  necromancer to raise you from the dead so I can kill you out of spite!    - Renda-Rae

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

results.name: Laladile
results.description: Summon your Laladile minion. Because small is beautiful.
results.enhanced_description: Unlike its monstrous cousins, this scalekin grows no more than a few fulms long and is docile besides. Once favored as a pet by Ishgardian nobility, who named it for the affable Lalafellin folk, it is known to befriend other creatures such as small birds.
results.tooltip: Never fuss over a sarcosuchus.    - Traditional Children's Song

verminion.skill_description:
Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eye impervious to damage.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Cerberpup
results.description: Summon your Cerberpup minion. With three wet little noses and three sets of adorable staring eyes, what's not to love? Aside from all of the teeth, obviously.
results.enhanced_description: This peculiar creature was found in a dark corner of a storehouse belonging to House Haillenarte. As voidsent are not uncommon in the wilds of Coerthas, it was at first thought to be a lesser such monstrosity, but─aside from the three heads─it appears to be an ordinary pup.
results.tooltip: We'll see if our bite's worse than our bark.    - Hilda

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

results.name: Malone
results.description: Summon your Malone minion. If it weren't following you around, it would be tearing hapless adventurers apart on the Diadem.
results.enhanced_description: A young prehistoric creature found on the Diadem, whose unforgiving environment forged its kind into ruthless predators. For reasons unknown, it saw you as friend instead of food, and began following you. Ever ravenous, it snaps at its own tail whenever it comes into view.
results.tooltip: There are too many of them. Too many dinosaurs for us to face alone!    - Vath Braveheart

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Paissa Threadpuller
results.description: Summon your paissa threadpuller minion. Currently in training as a weaver, and looks the part.
results.enhanced_description: When mysterious embroidery began appearing on the garments of her Rose Knights, Lady Laniaitte set out to uncover the perpetrator. Her surveillance led to the capture of this paissa young, which was made to work in Ishgard's restoration as punishment, though it appears happy enough.
results.tooltip: Death by ungainly paissa... thought mortifies Vanu worse than forgetting sundrop dance!    - Eenu Vanu

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Paissa Patissier
results.description: Summon your paissa patissier minion. Currently in training as a culinarian, and looks the part.
results.enhanced_description: This paissa young was found amongst supplies sent from Camp Cloudtop. As punishment for pillaging the victuals, it was put to work in the kitchens, where it surprised everyone by demonstrating an aptitude for the culinary arts. The caramel milk tea it makes is to die for.
results.tooltip: They don't come much curiouser than the paissa.    - Noelle

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

results.name: Unlucky Rabbit
results.description: Summon your unlucky rabbit minion. Has known the bitterest lows and the sweetest highs.
results.enhanced_description: Born of an idea proposed by Godbert Manderville, this leporine mammet proved tremendously popular in Ul'dah, but questions of ownership rights led to it serving as the mascot of the Platinum Mirage for a spell. It eventually returned to the Gold Saucer after legal matters were settled.
results.tooltip: The damn things reproduce faster than rabbits in heat.    - Raganher

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%. 
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Ancient One
results.description: Summon your ancient one minion. Small and appearing to be fractured, but whole.
results.enhanced_description: This lifelike miniature of an ancient was recreated from a small concept crystal discovered in Anamnesis Anyder. Though believed to have been some manner of toy, given the towering stature of the ancients, its size is comparable to that of a Lalafellin child.
results.tooltip: The challenge of deciphering the wisdom of the ancients is a researcher's dream.    - Y'mhitra

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **critters**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Little Leafman
results.description: Summon your little leafman minion. Definitely a leafman. The pixie said so.
results.enhanced_description: This curious being was found amongst the wares peddled by a pixie playing merchant. While it does bear resemblance to the leafmen scattered across Il Mheg, that it is able to move raises eyebrows, but inquiring after the reason only elicits impish laughter from the pixie.
results.tooltip: We're going to get along like a leafman on fire, I just know it!    - Uin Nee

sources.text: Sul Lad - Lydha Lran (Il Mheg) - 400 Bicolor Gemstones (Rank 3)

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
 **Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Dulia-Chai
results.description: Summon your wind-up Dulia-Chai minion. Complete with asphyxiated Chai-Nuzz.
results.enhanced_description: On the occasion of their twenty-fifth anniversary, Chai-Nuzz gifted his wife her mammet likeness, which he made using Talos construction techniques. It was subsequently presented to the departing Warrior of Darkness as a memento─with one small addition.
results.tooltip: Dear─ Dearest─ I─ I can't─    - Chai-Nuzz

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Reflection -Histories Forsaken- Artbook

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Wind-up Ryne
results.description: Summon your wind-up Ryne minion. Not merely a palette swap.
results.enhanced_description: With hair of spun gold and eyes of clearest sapphire, this young maiden was an incarnation of Minfilia, by whose name she was known. In the course of her journey, however, she chose to take her destiny into her own hands, and with it came a new look, name, and automaton likeness.
results.tooltip: What about... Ryne?    - Thancred

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Silver Dasher
results.description: Summon your silver dasher minion. Never was there a bird so adorable.
results.enhanced_description: This little bird suddenly appeared inside the hold of a submersible, in all likelihood wandering in when the mammet pilot surfaced the vessel and opened the hatch for fresh air. It has since gone on to charm everyone with its adorable appearance and antics.
results.tooltip: Oh, isn't it adorable?    - Jihli Aliapoh

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - The Open Robe, Rogo-Tumu-Here's Haunt, The Devil's Crypt, Sirensong 2

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: The Major-General
results.description: Summon your Major-General minion. It's a shark. With legs.
results.enhanced_description: “Many heads are so passé. Legs are the wave of the future,” someone did say. Little did they know that there already were sharks that possessed not only legs, but arms besides. How these killing machines came to be, however, is a question left unpondered if you value your sanity.
results.tooltip: To think I almost 'ad ye fed to the sharks!    - Rhoswen

sources.text: No More Fish In The Sea I

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: The Behatted Serpent Of Ronka
results.description: Summon your Behatted Serpent of Ronka minion. Tremble, child of man, for a creature of purest divinity wiggleth before thee in all of its behatted glory.
results.enhanced_description: Seeking to honor the Great Serpent of Ronka, the Stewards recreated the stylish ensemble it was once observed sporting, and made an offering of it to one of the divinity's incarnations gracing the Stopple. All agree that the outfit brings out the stately serpent's adventurous aspect.
results.tooltip: Screee-eee!    - The Behatted Serpent of Ronka

sources.text: Yuqurl Manl - Hopl's Stopple (The Rak'tika Greatwood) - 8 Qitari Compliments (Rank 8)

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: The Behelmeted Serpent Of Ronka
results.description: Summon your Behelmeted Serpent of Ronka minion. Tremble, child of man, for a creature of purest divinity wiggleth before thee in all of its behelmeted glory.
results.enhanced_description: This incarnation of the Great Serpent of Ronka is said to have appeared before the Stewards and directed them to restore the broken Qitari stela. Though equipped with a mining helm, the all-seeing divinity obviously has no need of such mortal contrivances to navigate dark caverns.
results.tooltip: Scree! Scree!    - The Behelmeted Serpent of Ronka

sources.text: Yuqurl Manl - Hopl's Stopple (The Rak'tika Greatwood) - 8 Qitari Compliments (Rank 4)

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 10% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Sungold Talos
results.description: Summon your sungold Talos minion. Guaranteed to make you the envy of collectors and younglings alike.
results.enhanced_description: During its heyday, Daedalus Stoneworks created this miniature Talos, which boasts true-to-life detail and a premium gold overlay. It proved so popular, the story goes that, to meet demand, the company had to recruit master gilders from all over Norvrandt.
results.tooltip: A much smaller Talos from our company could just as easily perform the same task!    - Chai-Nuzz

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 90%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

results.name: Cute Justice
results.description: Summon your Cute Justice minion. Rocket Punch parts may present a choking hazard. Not for children under the age of two.
results.enhanced_description: Lovingly crafted by an ex-Illuminati scientist now in the employ of the Garlond Ironworks, this colorful toy version of Brute Justice is composed of multiple pieces cast in solid zinc so that it may stand against even the most rambunctious of children.
results.tooltip: Verdict: Guilty. Punishment: Eradication!    - Brute Justice

sources.text: Maudlin Latool Ja - Ul'dah - 400 Allied Seals

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

results.name: Dress-up Estinien
results.description: Summon your dress-up Estinien minion. Sun-dried squid not included.
results.enhanced_description: A mammet fashioned in the likeness of the Azure Dragoon Estinien following his retirement from service. Created for the purpose of educating the younger generation about the Dragonsong War, it has been distributed to places of learning throughout Ishgard.
results.tooltip: I find myself less and less inclined to sear your squid!    - Orn Khai

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all enemies within range while increasing action party ATK by 20.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Miniature White Knight
results.description: Summon your miniature white knight minion. Aids in the purging of sickness. Or not.
results.enhanced_description: Crafted by the Skysteel Manufactory, this mammet was originally conceived for the Temple Knights to use in their strategizing, its mobility allowing for greater realism in battle simulations. Programmed to seek out formidable opponents.
results.tooltip: Only a knight errant may break a stalemate.    - Drillemont

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Pod 316
results.description: Summon your pod 316 minion. The perfect assistant for adventuring...or it would be, if it worked properly.
results.enhanced_description: Dug up in the depths of a factory fallen to ruin, this diminutive black machina was apparently designed to provide tactical support to a YoRHa. While most of its functions are no longer operational, it remains determined to attend the object of its support.
results.tooltip: Machina are mighty and can smite muchly, yes, but they need fuel.    - Softknox

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Pod 054
results.description: Summon your pod 054 minion. The perfect assistant for adventuring...or it would be, if it worked properly.
results.enhanced_description: Dug up in the depths of a factory fallen to ruin, this diminutive white machina was apparently designed to provide tactical support to a YoRHa. Though equipped with myriad functions, from support fire to advance conversation, none of these are operational at present.
results.tooltip: Machines are not to be trusted, least of all those that can think.    - Estinien

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Wind-up Pixie
results.description: Summon your wind-up pixie minion. Won't make mischief at your expense─pixie's honor.
results.enhanced_description: The Dreamspinners present this mammet as a gift to those children whom they have befriended. Unlike a real pixie, it doesn't make mischief, so you don't need to constantly be looking over your shoulders.
results.tooltip: Come and play with us...    - Titania

sources.text: Jul Oul - Lydha Lran (Il Mheg) - 8 Fae Fancy (Rank 6)

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

results.name: Wind-up Hobgoblin
results.description: Summon your wind-up hobgoblin minion. Crafted in the likeness of your mother...or so certain dwarves would say.
results.enhanced_description: Contrary to what certain dwarves may claim, the hobgoblin upon which this mammet was based is no relation of yours; rather, it was a creature that was haunting your retainer's dreams. By crafting this minion and gifting it to another, they hoped to pass on the nightmare.
results.tooltip: Your mother was a hobgoblin!    - Giott

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 270 to all enemies within range.
 **Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Domakin
results.description: Summon your domakin minion. Close, but not a warrior with the body of a mortal and soul of a dragon.
results.enhanced_description: Reeled in by your retainer, this delightfully plump fish was created by a Doman goldfish enthusiast, its name a portmanteau of his nation and the local word for gold. It floats in the air by virtue of the cloudsbreath seeds it devoured, though how it manages to breathe is unknown.
results.tooltip: Quite a catch indeed!    - Nortmoen

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Meerkat
results.description: Summon your meerkat minion. Keeps an eye out for danger while basking in the sun.
results.enhanced_description: Native to lands bordering the Sea of Ash, these small beastkin dwell in underground colonies, emerging from their burrows as the sun rises in order to bask in the warmth. Curiosity brought this creature to a submersible undergoing repairs on the shore, and it hasn't looked back since.
results.tooltip: I am rather looking forward  to basking in the sunshine of her praise.    - Emmanellain

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Coldtoe Isle, The Open Robe, The Stone Barbs, Bladefall Chasm, Sirensong 1

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Little Leannan
results.description: Summon your little leannan minion. Doesn't see you as food. Yet.
results.enhanced_description: Having just recently sprouted, this leannan young still possesses a mild temperament, but as its demands for nutrients grow, it will begin to hunt men and beasts alike. In preparation for this, it has already begun practicing its skills of enthrallment.
results.tooltip: Seeds know no borders; they will sprout wheresoever the earth embraces them.    - Martineau

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 60%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

results.name: Mystic Weapon
results.description: Summon your mystic weapon minion. Only slightly cursed.
results.enhanced_description: While out on a venture, your retainer discovered a timeworn blade and took it in their hand...whereupon a peculiar creature manifested. Though the weapon was believed to be cursed, the retainer was reportedly not concerned, as it was to be given to you in any case.
results.tooltip: I ain't got the patience for no mystic rubbish today.    - Gerolt

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Bacon Bits
results.description: Summon your bacon bits minion. Tastes like bacon...if bacon and clay taste the same to you.
results.enhanced_description: After seeing a dream wherein they were being followed by a flying pig, a retainer out gathering absent-mindedly worked some clay into the creature's likeness. To their surprise, the creature suddenly sprang to life─most likely at the hands of a pixie bent on mischief.
results.tooltip: I am curious as to what mischief the flying pig has in mind...    - Sue-Rend

verminion.skill_description: Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

results.name: Sharksucker-class Insubmersible
results.description: Summon your sharksucker-class insubmersible minion. Warning: do not immerse.
results.enhanced_description: Built by a mammet voyager in a moment of boredom, this clockwork ship raises several questions about machine ethics by its very existence. Another, perhaps more significant question it raises is, “Why build a functioning model submersible and not make it watertight?”
results.tooltip: Not water! Anything but water!    - Zahar'ak Hatchling

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - The Southern Charnel Trench, The Central Charnel Trench, The Slipped Anchor, Sirensong Sea 3

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all enemies within range while increasing action party ATK by 20.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Brave New Y'shtola
results.description: Summon your brave new Y'shtola minion. Not wont to run from her troubles─and couldn't get very far, anyway.
results.enhanced_description: Lovingly crafted by the Night's Blessed, this tiny mechanical Y'shtola─“Master Matoya,” to some─wears the black garb that marks her a member of their community, and bears a deadwood rod symbolizing her commitment to driving back the Light.
results.tooltip: Did you really think I would go gently into that dark night with so much left undone?    - Y'shtola

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Fuath
results.description: Summon your wind-up Fuath minion. Markedly less murderous than the real thing.
results.enhanced_description: Though this clockwork automaton─magically rendered waterproof for amphibious adventuring─possess no heart in which to harbor malice, the fact that it was created at the hands of *real* Fuath is cause enough to wonder what tricks it may be hiding up its tiny sleeve.
results.tooltip: The first rule of dealing with the Fuath...is do *not* deal with the Fuath.    - Ardbert

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, reduces the movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 20s
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Eden Minor
results.description: Summon your Eden Minor minion. Free of sin, though not for lack of trying.
results.enhanced_description: In a demonstration of its godlike power that may be generously termed “unfathomable,” Eden created this tiny being in its image. Fortunately, the amount of aether Eden Minor can manipulate is so minuscule that, despite its best efforts, it poses little danger to the world at large.
results.tooltip: For what was once shattered may be forged anew.    - Ryne

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 380 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Tinker's Bell
results.description: Summon your tinker's bell minion. Said to be named for a pixie...unless you ask the pixies, who adamantly deny that any of their kind would ever have borne such a ludicrous name.
results.enhanced_description: Discovered fallen off the monstrous Archaeotania by an Ondo youth, this enigmatic instrument, half-bell and half-maiden, is believed to be either an adornment from ancient times or a recreation thereof. Upon it is inscribed an enchantment that amplifies magical power.
results.tooltip: How do you measure half a bell anyway?    - Mauto

sources.text: Fathard - Eulmore - 6 Archaeotania's Horn (FATE "The Head, The Tail, the Whole Damned Thing" - The Tempest)

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
 **Duration:** 6s

results.name: Ironfrog Ambler
results.description: Summon your ironfrog ambler minion, a darling, diminutive, dwarven-made...automaton.
results.enhanced_description: This diminutive automaton is designed to automatically load itself with the ore which serves as its energy source. However, the function appears to be overactive, resulting in it compulsively checking whether the ore is present. The wind-up key is a purely aesthetic addition.
results.tooltip: A-digging we will go!    - Korutt

sources.text: Fathard - Eulmore - 6 Formidable Cog (FATE "A Finale Most Formidable" - Kholusia)

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Wind-up G'raha Tia
results.description: Summon your wind-up G'raha Tia minion. The future is where his destiny awaits.
results.enhanced_description: In order to fund the expedition to the Syrcus Trench, Tataru crafted this series of automaton, modeled upon a certain Archon, the tales of whom she heard from Rammbroes.
results.tooltip: A man could study for two lifetimes and only learn half of what you know.    - Cid

verminion.skill_description:
Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eye impervious to damage.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Wind-up Fran
results.description: Summon your wind-up Fran minion. Stilettos guaranteed not to impede progress through markedly rough terrain such as jungles, bogs, and abandoned monasteries serving as prisons for extra-dimensional forces of evil.
results.enhanced_description: Taking a page from the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, Bangaa fusilier Rinok secretly commissioned the creation of scores of miniature Fran fetishes in an effort to fill the coffers of the perpetually under-funded resistance movement spearheaded by Lente's Tears.
results.tooltip: Fran is not too bad, once you're on her good side.    - Rinok

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

results.name: Wind-up Suzaku
results.description: Summon your wind-up Suzaku minion, complete with her flute and her senses.
results.enhanced_description: Upon hearing the tale of his compatriot Soroban's adventures, a Kojin dollmaker was moved to honor the Four Lords, guardians of the Ruby Sea. This recreation of Suzaku is one of the fruits of his efforts, masterfully capturing the essence of the legendary auspice.
results.tooltip: If anyone can make Suzaku see reason, it's you. Good luck!    - Senri

sources.text: Item code included with Shadowbringers Original Soundtrack

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Nu Mou
results.description: Summon your wind-up Nu Mou minion. So cuddlesome it hurts.
results.enhanced_description: Designed in the likeness of a former member of Clan Nutsy, this automaton appears so cuddlesome as if it were made of cotton. Most folk think twice about cuddling it, however, when they learn it was actually made by a Nu Mou claybender using mud and mushroom spores.
results.tooltip: A ring, a ring, a wondrous thing, when its metal band hides a Nu Mou's sting!♪     - Nee Marn

sources.text: Xylle (The Crystarium) / Ilfroy (Eulmore) - 800 Sacks of Nuts

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Giant Beaver
results.description: Summon your giant beaver minion, a mystery better left unsolved.
results.enhanced_description: A mysterious being that appeared at Phisor Lran. Whatever may be the truth of its identity, some mysteries in the world are better left unsolved. Let it be enough that everyone has their heart's desire...
results.tooltip: Something tells me that's one more mystery better left unsolved.    - Ellie

sources.text: Giant Beaver - Il Mheg - 1 Dancing Wing (Requires Quest "And Then There Were None")

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

results.name: Shoebill
results.description: Summon your shoebill minion, an unflappable bird possessed of a regal air...or perhaps simply a condescending one.
results.enhanced_description: Common to Kholusia, the shoebill is known for being literally unmoving. Its hunting effort consists of waiting for prey to wander by its feet before it deigns to strike. For reasons unknown, it saw fit to accept you as its master, and now follows you wherever you go...with the bare minimum of exertion.
results.tooltip: Love can move shoebills.    - Ancient Ballad

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 40%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Bitty Duckbill
results.description: Summon your bitty duckbill minion. Do not attempt to put on your feet.
results.enhanced_description: Named for its duck-like bill, this creature hunts not by sight or smell, but rather by sensing the aetheric discharge from prey. It can also deliver a potent venom from the spurs on its hindfeet, causing great pain if not death─a sobering contrast to its adorable appearance.
results.tooltip: Aren't you just the most adorable little thing!?     - Jessie

sources.text: Xylle (The Crystarium) / Ilfroy (Eulmore) - 800 Sacks of Nuts

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 20 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Butterfly Effect
results.description: Summon your butterfly effect minion. Illusory and therefore incapable of invoking any history-shattering consequences...right?
results.enhanced_description: There is a theory which states that the fluttering of a butterfly's wings may give rise to a raging storm a thousand malms away. This crystal has nothing to do with that theory; rather, it is said to simply be the work of a priest of Ronka, created during a bout of boredom.
results.tooltip: Take wing, ye souls of war!    - Ravana

sources.text: Nacille - Fanow (The Rak'tika Greatwood) - 400 Bicolor Gemstones (Rank 3)

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: The Great Serpent Of Ronka
results.description: Summon your Great Serpent of Ronka minion. Tremble, child of man, for a creature of purest divinity wiggleth before thee.
results.enhanced_description: This creature, Quinfort insists, is none other than the all-seeing, all-powerful Great Serpent of Ronka. Though its wobbly girth may deceive the eye, that is, presumably, a mere mark of the serpent's mercy, for its true form would be too terrible for mortal minds to comprehend.
results.tooltip: Screee!    - The Great Serpent of Ronka

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%. 
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Chameleon
results.description: Summon your chameleon minion and marvel as it melts into your surrounds.
results.enhanced_description: By channeling aether into its crystal-coated scales, the chameleon can alter its appearance to blend into the surrounding environment in a mechanism not unlike that of glamour prisms. For its penchant for adopting new looks, it has earned a reputation as the “glamourous scalekin.”
results.tooltip: Oh, I suggest nothing so glamorous.    - Nero tol Scaeva

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 50%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

results.name: Black Hayate
results.description: Summon your black hayate minion. Gaze upon the visage of a ruthless killer.
results.enhanced_description: Despite their endearing appearance, black hayate are oft employed as guard and sheep dogs, as they react to threats with shocking ferocity. It was for this reason that the breed was named after a piece of lethal weaponry from its eastern homeland, now lost to the Flood.
results.tooltip: They expected hounds on their trail and I sssent them a dragon!    - Eshana

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 40.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Wind-up Omega-F
results.description: Summon your wind-up Omega-F minion to test the efficacy of combat role allocation.
results.enhanced_description: This automaton is the work of a goldsmith who desired to explore new definitions of beauty. When an engineer of Garlond Ironworks went to question the man about how he came upon his subject matter, he is said to have abruptly vanished, as if swallowed into the Interdimensional Rift.
results.tooltip: Initiating system shutdown...

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (60 if the ally is wind-up Omega-M).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Omega-M
results.description: Summon your wind-up Omega-M minion to observe your irrational behavior.
results.enhanced_description: This automaton is the work of a goldsmith who desired to explore new definitions of beauty. Upon delivering a batch to the House of Splendors, the man is said to have declared, “To understand the one, one must understand the other. For their beauty lies in the whole.”
results.tooltip: <bleep> hELLo, WOrlD!?

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (40 if the ally is wind-up Omega-F).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Forgiven Hate
results.description: Summon your forgiven hate minion. Having repented its sins, it poses no danger.
results.enhanced_description: A sin eater-esque something or other found on Mt. Gulg. Though it follows you relentlessly, as if driven by hate, it can do little save flutter about and occasionally unravel itself. There seems to be no harm in keeping it with you for now...
results.tooltip: I'm just going to assume that cube is an eater.    - Thancred

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Tiny Echevore
results.description: Summon your tiny echevore minion. Its tail tastes like nectar...but you wouldn't know such things.
results.enhanced_description: The scales on this critter's back are arranged in such a way as to put one in mind of the succulent echeveria. Lying concealed in tall grass, it lures insects with its tail, which secretes a sweet-tasting fluid akin to nectar.
results.tooltip: I shall enjoy sucking on its tail for that sweet, sweet nectar taste!    - Overzealous Nu Mou

verminion.skill_description:
Grants action party the ability to deal extra damage to Arcana Stones.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Clionid Larva
results.description: Summon your clionid larva minion, small on size but massive on appetite.
results.enhanced_description: A relative of the sea slug, the clionid feeds on plankton early in life. As it matures, however, it begins consuming flesh in order to satisfy its voracious appetite, and uses the tentacles extending from its head to latch onto prey. For now it follows you obediently. For now...
results.tooltip: What a delicious morsel! I wanna get my tentacles around her...    - Ultros

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Search Eye by 90%. No effect if Search Eye is already inoperable.

results.name: Micro Gigantender
results.description: Summon your micro gigantender minion. Is it small or is it big? You be the judge.
results.enhanced_description: Though known for their prodigious size, gigantenders come into the world small and grow ever so slowly. This creature is estimated to be between twenty and thirty years of age, which by gigantender standards is still considered young. The oldest known creatures are said to live beyond two centuries.
results.tooltip: In another three hundred years, I'll be bigger and stronger than you will ever be!    - Ohl Deeh

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 8% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Armadillo Bowler
results.description: Summon your armadillo bowler minion. Possessed of a superior sense of balance.
results.enhanced_description: Armadillos are seldom caught without their rocks, which they use to defend themselves from enemies. As a large rock bespeaks strength and status, one may occasionally see bravado-bound beasts that unwisely choose something beyond their ability to lift.
results.tooltip: Who was that armored devil!?     - Alphinaud

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **monsters**.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Zephyrous Zabuton
results.description: Summon your zephyrous zabuton minion. More pushing for another cushion.
results.enhanced_description: It is well documented that Hingans shun chairs, preferring instead to sit upon the floor. What is less known, however, is that when a speaker utters something deemed clever, she is rewarded with cushions that she may sit in a position elevated above her peers.
results.tooltip: We would be singing of mending socks and sitting on cushions.    - The Wandering Minstrel

sources.text: Shikitahe - Tamamizu (The Ruby Sea) - 5 Kojin Sango (Rank 9)

verminion.skill_description: Transports action party to the central summoning Gate.

results.name: Dress-up Tataru
results.description: Summon your dress-up Tataru minion. Say what you will, she wears it well.
results.enhanced_description: To thank those adventurers who have come to her aid while in Kugane, Tataru Taru of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn has been presenting her knights in shining armor with handcrafted replicas of...herself, fully clad in the finest silks from Bukyo.
results.tooltip: Tataru's expression grows ever darker each time I see her pass by.    - Slafborn

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of the Revolution -Eastern Memories-

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Qalyana
results.description: Summon your wind-up Qalyana minion. She may or may not break through the borderline.
results.enhanced_description: The ex-Gatekeeper who crafted this doll claims her model was a Qalyana battlemaid who awoke from her reverie to join Alpa in the headstrong Vira's endeavor to protect the realm. She hopes it serves to strengthen the bond 'twixt the Ananta tribes.
results.tooltip: The Qalyana are another Ananta tribe─the strongest and the most influential.    - M'naago

sources.text: Madhura - Castellum Velodyna (The Fringes) - 7 Ananta Dreamstaffs (Rank 9)

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Redback
results.description: Summon your wind-up Redback minion. Don't tell mom the Kojin minion's red.
results.enhanced_description: A master craftsman hailing from the Kojin of the Blue conceived this miniature automaton with the hopes that it might one day bring together his clan and the Kojin of the Red. How exactly an automaton might do that has yet to be determined...
results.tooltip: I'm a giant tortoise! A tortoise!    - Soroban

sources.text: Shikitahe - Tamamizu (The Ruby Sea) - 5 Kojin Sango (Rank 9)

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 10%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Yukinko Snowflake
results.description: Summon your yukinko snowflake minion. Falling, falling, falling, falling, falling...falling on his head.
results.enhanced_description: The yukinko's woven headdress serves not only to protect the creature from the elements, but spare it the embarrassment of having its nakedness exposed unto the world─not that any sane man would dare peek under the straw, lest he risk eternal damnation.
results.tooltip: It is the enemy that weighs on me─snow, rather than fire.    - Martiallais

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 70 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Conditional Virtue
results.description: Summon your Conditional Virtue minion. Cuddle not to dullness; coddle not to elevation.
results.enhanced_description: From a pulsating mass of aetherial flesh sloughed off the Eurekan elemental Absolute Virtue did rise this uncanny facsimile, identical to its progenitor in every way─every way, that is, except size and, well, absoluteness.
results.tooltip: Men measure virtue in many ways.    - Yayaroku

verminion.skill_description:
Increases caster ATK by 10 and DEF by 5 for every 5% of HP lost.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Ramza
results.description: Summon your wind-up Ramza minion. Stands ready to fight for truth, justice, and the Ivalician way.
results.enhanced_description: Designed after Ramza Beoulve─unsung champion of Ivalician legend and not the son of the exiled Majestic Theater Company principal─this mammet's creation was commissioned by Jenomis cen Lexentale to pay honor to the true hero of the Zodiac Brave Story.
results.tooltip: Put that damnable thing down, Ramza. You're not helping matters!    - Jenomis cen Lexentale

verminion.skill_description:
Renders action party immune to all attacks.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Aerith
results.description: Summon your wind-up Aerith minion. The future ith not only yourth.
results.enhanced_description: A somber reimagining of the ill-fated flowermonger who would set off on a journey to discover herself, only to find more than she bargained for. What is wind-up can never die.
results.tooltip: This guy are sick.    - Aerith

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **critters**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Cloud
results.description: Summon your wind-up Cloud minion. Sharp hair, don't care.
results.enhanced_description: At first glance, it appears that the artisan took numerous liberties in this rendition of the legendary hero─the distinct lack of upper-body muscle mass suggesting Cloud would have been unable to even lift a weapon the size of the Buster Sword, let alone brandish it over his head.
results.tooltip: ...something.    - Cloud

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 380 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Minitek Conveyor
results.description: Summon your minitek conveyor minion. The latest in miniature transport technology.
results.enhanced_description: It is not in Garlean nature to leave well enough alone, and so imperial magitek engineers crafted miniature versions of their mountable conveyor unit. However, through some design flaw, the automaton atop the belt appears highly susceptible to possession by voidsent.
results.tooltip: Thankless job, carrier is.    - Ehcatl Nine Carrier

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 8s

results.name: Wind-up Weapon
results.description: Summon your wind-up weapon minion. Somewhat buggy.
results.enhanced_description: Scaled-down replicas of armored weapons have long been mass-produced by the Garlean Imperial Army in an effort to train new recruits in the proper methods of magitek deployment and repair.
results.tooltip: Be on your guard─ he's known to be armed!    - Brass Blade

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Elvaan
results.description: Summon your wind-up Elvaan minion. Remarks relating to a certain people's perpetually dour facial expressions are best kept to oneself.
results.enhanced_description: A stack of dusty tomes and a healthy imagination served as inspiration for this automaton designed to depict an Elvaan─possible (but improbable) ancestor of the Elezen. He wears a blue cotehardie rendered in painstaking—and pointless—detail by his Sharlayan creator.
results.tooltip: Curious pointed ears... I wonder where they could have come from, kupo?    - Mogleo

sources.text: FATE "You Do Know Jack" - Eureka Pyros

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Seitei
results.description: Summon your Seitei minion. Dragon-ness is in the eye of the beholder.
results.enhanced_description: While the true Seiryu has been documented as being more serpent than dragon, this replica of the azure auspice bears a striking resemblance to Kirin (though assurances have been made that this design decision was by no means a cost-cutting measure).
results.tooltip: Hurry up and knock some sense into Seiryu's noggin!    - Kamaitachi

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Abroader Otter
results.description: Summon your abroader otter minion. Hobbies include playing and having fun on an island in the sun.
results.enhanced_description: Legend tells of a right mad otter who, dissatisfied with the fare of his home waters, bought a ship and made south for more bountiful seas. There, he ate like a king...until his boat sank in a storm, leaving the slippery pup alone on stranger tides.
results.tooltip: He seemed...odd. Well, odder than usual.    - Cocobezi

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Deep-sea Site 7, Sea of Ash 2, Sea of Ash 3, Nald'thal's Pipe, The Isle of Sacrament

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Hedgehoglet
results.description: Summon your hedgehoglet minion. Only your selfless love and affection can keep him blissfully dilemma-free.
results.enhanced_description: For centuries, hedgehogs have been considered a delicacy in the Far East, their succulent flesh supped upon by prince and pauper alike. An influx of Western traders more interested in keeping the pups as pets, however, has all but put an end to this grisly tradition.
results.tooltip: I need not explain what a needle is, I trust?    - Redolent Rose

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Baby Gremlin
results.description: Summon your baby gremlin minion. Feeding after midnight may result in injury. Yours.
results.enhanced_description: Be not fooled by a gremlin's snow-white fur, for its intentions are as black as the night in which it thrives. Unlike more common stock, this particular breed appears to be resistant to both light and water, making them perfect pets for someone who doesn't mind a bit of mischief.
results.tooltip: Thin skin and big mouths make for an uneasy combination.    - Hunter-scholar

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK by all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Dhalmel Calf
results.description: Summon your dhalmel calf minion. Oddly short yet alarmingly tall.
results.enhanced_description: Considering this young specimen was most likely bred in captivity for the purpose of research, it is nothing short of a miracle that the calf has managed to survive the harsh environment of Eureka for as long as it has.
results.tooltip: Yes, you─with the long neck.    - Tsukumo

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

results.name: Wind-up Tifa
results.description: Summon your wind-up Tifa minion. Not the wrong person.
results.enhanced_description: A gravity-defying rendition of the legendary bartending brawler, carved with tender loving care by a seven-fingered craftsman who is oft overheard mumbling to himself, “Words aren't the only way to tell someone how you feel.”
results.tooltip: Fu, fu, fu... Be nice, Don.    - Tifa

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Little Yang
results.description: Summon your Little Yang minion. Every now and then he gets a little bit closer.
results.enhanced_description: One half of a pair of (literally) animated decorations you stumbled across during the All Saints' Wake festivities. Members of the Continental Circus are at a loss as to why this spry specter appears to have a will of its own, though “possession” is high on their list of theories.
results.tooltip: Everyone'll think you a ghost!    - Erapi Taropi

verminion.skill_description:
Renders action party immune to all attacks.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Little Yin
results.description: Summon your Little Yin minion. Turn around.
results.enhanced_description: One half of a pair of (literally) animated decorations you stumbled across during the All Saints' Wake festivities. Members of the Continental Circus are at a loss as to why this sullen specter appears to have a will of its own, though “possession” is high on their list of theories.
results.tooltip: Are we really sleepin' at a graveyard? 'Cause I'm afraid of ghosts...    - Hal

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Alpha
results.description: Summon your wind-up Alpha minion. Kweh-ing along under some distant sky.
results.enhanced_description: Crafted at the Garlond Ironworks, this miniature reproduction of your faithful (if not somewhat deformed) companion was gifted to you by engineer Jessie Jaye upon your triumphant return from the Alphascape.
results.tooltip: Well, Alpha certainly seems keen.    - Cid

verminion.skill_description: Transports action party to the central summoning Gate.

results.name: Scarlet Peacock
results.description: Summon your scarlet peacock minion. Prettier than your average peacock, and several times as flammable.
results.enhanced_description: Peafowl have long been admired in the Far East for their brilliant plumage, but it is their penchant for hunting venomous vilekin that has earned them reverence typically reserved for kami. As such, effigies of the birds are believed to bring their owners good fortune.
results.tooltip: There will come a time when we must confront Suzaku.    - Genbu

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Capybara Pup
results.description: Summon your capybara pup minion. Loves bath time, and you.
results.enhanced_description: Known in Hingashi as the “onitenjikunezumi” (quite liberally translated as “Near Eastern demon rat”), this rodent auspice of unknown age has developed a fondness for Far Eastern hot springs, and will spend days in the restorative waters if not reminded to come out and eat.
results.tooltip: Such simple creatures, rats.    - Charibert

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: OMG
results.description: Summon your OMG minion. Weird. Technological. Fascinating.
results.enhanced_description: Despite a striking resemblance to the extra-dimensional mechanical monstrosity that nearly ended your life, this miniature model of Omega does naught but follow in your wake. Wedge of the Garlond Ironworks posits it may have been created to observe your behavior.
results.tooltip: Soon, Omega, soon... I will see you rise again!    - Nero tol Scaeva

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while inflicting a weakness to **monsters**.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Mudpie
results.description: Summon your mudpie minion. At last, portable filth.
results.enhanced_description: A thick, brown mass of living effluence squeezed forth from one of the horror Tokkapchi's many hidden orifices. Though the squirt stinks of sopping sod, one might find themselves pressed to deny the amorphous alluvium is anything but adorable.
results.tooltip: I was almost certain you'd want to muddy the waters.    - Jessie

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 70%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Bridesmoogle
results.description: Summon your bridesmoogle minion. What is a blushing bride without a dutiful bridesmoogle to scatter petals in her general vicinity?
results.enhanced_description: Moogles serving the Sanctum of the Twelve claim the magicked poppets (provided with purchase of a lavish Ceremony of Eternal Bonding) are guaranteed to bring happiness. Conveniently offer no refunds if you do not hap upon said happiness.
results.tooltip: Wh-What have you done with my bride!?    - Vannes

sources.text: Attend a Ceremony of Eternal Bonding (Gold/Platinum)

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 10.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Taoist Moogle
results.description: Summon your Taoist moogle minion. The mogpath that can be spoken of is not the true mogpath, kupo.
results.enhanced_description: Enrei, acolyte to renowned Far Eastern monk, Master Togen, is believed to have handcrafted this quaint automaton for a kind adventurer who once lent her aid to the pair. How it ended up for sale in a foreign market remains a mystery.
results.tooltip: I wasn't joking, by the way. About the moogle punching.    - Sidurgu

verminion.skill_description: Knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Poogie
results.description: Summon your Poogie minion. Beloved by hunters, though the feeling is not always mutual.
results.enhanced_description: Many a hunter from lands both near and far has proclaimed this tiny piglet “cute enough to eat.” Not literally, of course. Alright, sometimes literally, but not this time. There will be no eating of Poogie, and that is final.
results.tooltip: Ungodly swine! I would sooner *die* than surrender to you!    - Vault Priest

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

results.name: Palico
results.description: Summon your Palico minion. Very punny.
results.enhanced_description: Hailing from a land so distant it does not appear on any map, this catlike hunter has traveled to far eastern Othard in pursuit of his quarry─the fire-breathing Rathalos. How he came to fight by your side is a story better told over a roast leg of wyvern.
results.tooltip: They allowed him to bring the sum of his skills to bear...or maybe *cat*, on his foes.    - Gerolt

sources.text: The New King on the Block

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Tarutaru
results.description: Summon your wind-up Tarutaru minion. Remarks relating to a certain people's stature and the diminutiveness thereof are best kept to oneself.
results.enhanced_description: A stack of dusty tomes and a healthy imagination served as inspiration for this automaton designed to depict the Tarutaru─supposed ancestor of the Lalafell. She wears a gaudy vermilion cloak rendered in painstaking—and pointless—detail by her Sharlayan creator.
results.tooltip: Ages ago, there lived a female mage of no small repute who was known by all sorts of unsavory epithets.    - Gerolt

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Copycat Bulb
results.description: Summon your copycat bulb minion. The only companion you need if you want no other companions.
results.enhanced_description: Swaddled in crimson cloth and transfixed with an all-too-familiar earring, this shambling seedkin─seemingly fallen from the infamously fetid Cassie─reeks of rotting rutabagas and sour spirits.
results.tooltip: The sapling is well on its way to becoming a tree.    - Beatin

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Cirina
results.description: Summon your wind-up Cirina minion. Hungry for divine guidance. Also buuz.
results.enhanced_description: Commissioned for the Rising to promote interest in Xaela culture, this fully operational automaton was designed with painstaking detail, using the Mol youth Cirina as a model.
results.tooltip: She's braver than she looks.    - Lyse

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Frilled Dragon
results.description: Summon your frilled dragon minion. Also known as the *chlamydosaurus* but...uh, yeah.
results.enhanced_description: Tree-dwellers by nature, frilled dragons only descend to hunt, using their powerful rear legs to propel them forward at speeds that rival most Lalafell. When intimidated, they will spread out the spiked frills adorning their necks, hoping to frighten would-be predators.
results.tooltip: Are you some kind of lesser dragon, kupo?    - Mogzin

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Clockwork Lantern
results.description: Summon your clockwork lantern minion. Hands-free illumination for the busy insomniac.
results.enhanced_description: Seeing as collaborations are now all the rage in Eorzea, it did not take long for the tinkers of Eshtaime's Lapidaries to find their way to Frondale's Phrontistery to see what madness their collective minds could conceive. (A lantern. They made a lantern.)
results.tooltip: They can scarce make do without their lanterns.    - Armelle

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Sadu
results.description: Summon your wind-up Sadu minion. Will most likely not call any of your companions a stunted chuluu.
results.enhanced_description: There once lived a young Dotharli warrior who dreamed of taking the khatun into his arms and, well, doing things that young Dotharli warriors dream of doing. He quickly realized he valued his life and instead crafted this less imposing stand-in.
results.tooltip: Is the khatun woman or man? A stupid question. She is Sadu.    - Koko

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all enemies within range. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

results.name: Wind-up Magnai
results.description: Summon your wind-up Magnai minion. Ever in search of true love.
results.enhanced_description: When, after countless moons, their most radiant brother could still not find a suitable wife, several of the Oronir visited Kugane to have poppets created in Magnai's likeness. As of this writing, the outspoken leader remains alone.
results.tooltip: You're not related or something, are you?    - Lyse

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 10% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Wind-up Zhloe
results.description: Summon your wind-up Zhloe minion. Cannot thank you enough, but will certainly try.
results.enhanced_description: Impressed with Zhloe's tireless efforts at the orphanage, a craftsman employed by Rowena's House of Splendors created an automaton version of the altruist and gifted it to her sister, Khloe...who silently added it to her table of rewards.
results.tooltip: But deep down, I knew that Mummy and Daddy were never coming back.    - T'kebbe

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

results.name: Wind-up Tsukuyomi
results.description: Summon your wind-up Tsukuyomi minion. Barren waters, heed unto the tide.
results.enhanced_description: Conscripted into the imperial army, only to be handed over to Eorzean Alliance officials in an unreported prisoner exchange, one humble goldsmith celebrated his regained freedom how most goldsmiths do─he crafted a lifelike replica of the Lady of the Moon, Tsukuyomi.
results.tooltip: And I am but the moon.    - Lebrassoir

sources.text: Item code included with Stormblood Original Soundtrack

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Attendee #777
results.description: Summon your attendee #777 minion. Wasshoi, yes, yes.
results.enhanced_description: Gyoshin labored through several nights to fincraft this tiny Namazu (though the happi stitchwork is clearly Gyorei's). He intended to make it in the likeness of the 777th attendee, but soon lost count, so model selection was ultimately random.
results.tooltip: I am happy to have met some- one so delici─deft of hand.    - Cirina

sources.text: Gyosho - Dhoro Iloh (The Azim Steppe) - 7 Namazu Koban (Rank 4)

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 20.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Construct 8
results.description: Summon your Construct 8 minion. Batteries not included.
results.enhanced_description: Inoperative when discovered in the Clockwork City of Goug, the queer device whirred to life when a crystal was inserted under its chest plate. As long as the crystal is not replaced with auracite, the automaton should prove harmless.
results.tooltip: A construct born of desperation and denial.    - Penitent Heretic

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack 5 times the potency of the caster's ATK.

results.name: Monkey King
results.description: Summon your magic monkey minion. King of monkeys. Equal of heaven. Inspirer of “awww.”
results.enhanced_description: A miniature doppelganger of Qitian Dasheng magically brought into being by the ancient auspice himself. Originally used by the monkey king to cozen corrival and companion alike, now it merely serves to act adorable as it hovers nearby its new owner.
results.tooltip: It seems this year shall belong to the monkey after all!    - Saru Doshin

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Mithra
results.description: Summon your wind-up Mithra minion. Opinions on how Miqo'te rate compared to their supposed ancestors are best kept to oneself.
results.enhanced_description: A stack of dusty tomes and a healthy imagination served as inspiration for this automaton designed to depict the Mithra─supposed ancestor of the Miqo'te. She wears a traditional scorpion harness rendered in painstaking—and pointless—detail by her Sharlayan creator.
results.tooltip: Looking to make a new frrriend, are we?    - Nanaa Mihgo

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: The Prince Of Anemos
results.description: Summon your Prince of Anemos minion. Cute and cudgely.
results.enhanced_description: Much to the chagrin of his father─the Lord of Anemos─the young heir has yet to outgrow the odd habit of concealing cudgels and using them to bludgeon anyone who dares question his merits. Thankfully, an absence of thew leaves his lively blows lacking.
results.tooltip: By the Twelve, what a hideous, monstrous abomination!    - The Impresario

sources.text: FATE "The Shadow over Anemos" - Eureka Anemos

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Fafnir
results.description: Summon your wind-up Fafnir minion. Protective eyewear highly recommended.
results.enhanced_description: Why the scholar who crafted this mechanical marvel felt that an already deadly dragon need carry a sword (and a legendary one, at that) remains unclear. When questioned, he simply refused to alter the design and began muttering about “drop rates.”
results.tooltip: Those hard scales, those claws...that puny body. Are you some kind of lesser dragon, kupo?    - Mogzin

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Private Moai
results.description: Summon your private moai minion. It's watching you, watching you, watching you.
results.enhanced_description: Carved from the remnants of a larger statue found deep beneath the Ruby Sea, the reasons why or even how it can propel itself remain unknown. Rumors of bright rings pouring forth from the effigy's mouth, however, are largely exaggerated.
results.tooltip: Either that was a trick of the light, or that statue just moved...    - Shigure

sources.text: Crafted by Blacksmith - Subaquatic Voyages: Neolith Island, The Blue Hole, The Kraken's Tomb

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **gadget**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Motley Egg
results.description: Summon your motley egg minion. The tiny Archon inside is certain to kickstart your heart.
results.enhanced_description: As thanks for aiding Jihli Aliapoh in the retrieval of several stolen eggs, the original Egg Dreamer has gifted you with an eggspertly crafted automaton featuring Radcliffe the Red, famed first Archon of the Sixth Umbral Era.
results.tooltip: Personally, I've always had a thing for a motley.    - Cornell

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Yotsuyu
results.description: Summon your wind-up Yotsuyu minion. For that delicious disdain you never knew you needed.
results.enhanced_description: Searching for artistic inspiration, a goldsmith chanced to see an imported painting of a Doman beauty. The woman was apparently a renowned courtesan, and her exquisitely haughty features so enthralled him that he decided to immortalize her in mammet form.
results.tooltip: Surely Yotsuyu has crossed the line now...    - Alisaie

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of the Revolution -Western Memories-

verminion.skill_description: Sets a trap which can be activated by button after 10 seconds. When triggered, it delivers an attack with a potency of 180 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Byakko Cub
results.description: Summon your Byakko cub minion. Got to be the fuzziest.
results.enhanced_description: While not the actual progeny of the thousand-year-old auspice lord, this eponymous recreation (in newborn form) is sought after by Hingans hoping to see their luck turn for the better.
results.tooltip: Genbu may be the oldest, but Byakko's got to be the fuzziest.    - Kamaitachi

verminion.skill_description: Knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Ananta
results.description: Summon your wind-up Ananta minion. Why did it have to be a snake?
results.enhanced_description: The ex-Gatekeeper sapper who crafted this doll claims her model was a recently molted Sarisha─new scales glistening in the sun. Proceeds from the sale of each piece are used as remuneration to those who aid the battlemaids in their endeavors.
results.tooltip: Someone bring the snake!    - Fordola rem Lupis

sources.text: Madhura - Castellum Velodyna (The Fringes) - 7 Ananta Dreamstaffs (Rank 4)

verminion.skill_description: Restores 200 HP to all allies within range (250 if the ally is a **poppet**).

results.name: The Gold Whisker
results.description: Summon your Gold Whisker minion. Beckons you to enter his barrel of sin, but don't go in.
results.enhanced_description: This gaudy rendition of a Namazu is not actually solid gold, but merely a wooden automaton adorned with gold leaf. Its creator, however, hopes that will be enough to fool trade ships from the West to import his “lucky catfish.”
results.tooltip: Within these whiskers lies unbound potential.    - Old Namazu Master

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Aurelia Polyp
results.description: Summon your aurelia polyp minion. Lighter than air─er...water.
results.enhanced_description: Hitching a ride in the ballast tank of a submersible proved an enlightening experience for this infant wavekin, allowing it to listen in on the incessant mumblings of the vessel's pilot─a mammet voyager tasked with taking an audio log of all discoveries made.
results.tooltip: Tonight we will feast on the jellyfish while my jealous fish of a brother drinks in his tears!    - Nortmoen

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Deep-sea Site 3, The Umbrella Narrow, The Cobalt Shoals, Deep-sea Site 5, The Upwell, Glutton's Belly, Sea of Jade 1, Anthemoessa Undertow

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Komainu
results.description: Summon your komainu minion. Part lion, part dog, all lion-dog.
results.enhanced_description: Believed to ward the places from intruders with evil intent, statues of these mythical lion-dog creatures are oft erected at the gates of sacred locations such as shrines. When paired with another, they will always face forward.
results.tooltip: Bright as a lamp, brave as a lion.    - Haermaga

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

results.name: White Whittret
results.description: Summon your white whittret minion. Once you pop...
results.enhanced_description: This young male weasel with fur as yellow? as the winter's first snow once dreamed of becoming a pupil of the great auspice Kamaitachi. However, upon witnessing the Warrior of Light's prowess in Hells' Lid, he decided he would be better off siding with the latter.
results.tooltip: Don't talk to me! Talk to the cat...or the weasel.    - Tataru

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Kefka
results.description: Summon your wind-up Kefka minion. Just can't believe it? Believe it!
results.enhanced_description: Other than a vague claim by Y'shtola that the doll you discovered in Omega's Sigmascape seems “eerily familiar,” none of your companions can recall ever hearing of a wicked jester known as Kefka, be it in history books or children's tales.
results.tooltip: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have an appointment with Kefka!    - Locke Cole

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Tengu Doll
results.description: Summon your tengu doll minion. And you know what they say about the size of a doll's nose.
results.enhanced_description: A doll made in the likeness of a legendary Far Eastern creature, surprisingly animated for an inanimate object─a mystery Far Eastern folk would attribute to the mischievous tengu. Much like how a coveted piece of gear boasting five materia slots suddenly becomes a doll.
results.tooltip: How do you hope to survive with even more beaks to feed?    - Sanu Vanu

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%. 
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Hien
results.description: Summon your wind-up Hien minion. Be proud, my new owner. Be proud.
results.enhanced_description: Under imperial rule, Doman dollmakers were forbidden from crafting automata such as the kiyofusa, but this did not stop one brave soul from honoring the popular young Lord Hien with a mammet in his likeness. Its creator can rightly be proud!
results.tooltip: There is no denying that he has a presence...    - Haname

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Dress-up Raubahn
results.description: Summon your dress-up Raubahn minion. Detachable arm optional.
results.enhanced_description: Ostensibly produced to commemorate Ala Mhigo's liberation, this avatar of the Flame General was originally meant to serve as an apology for the campaign's troubled start. To that end, it was said to have been programmed to beg forgiveness a dozen different ways.
results.tooltip: Wait till the Flame General hears about this!    - M'naago

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Shinryu
results.description: Summon your wind-up Shinryu minion. Exhibits an almost preternatural urge to hide in treasure chests and guard powerful weapons.
results.enhanced_description: The designer of this mammet was tasked with recreating the dread-filled moment when Shinryu gains his freedom, bursting forth from a cocoon of light. The result is a rather loose interpretation, to say the least.
results.tooltip: I should very much like to see this “Shinryu” creature for myself.    - Nero tol Scaeva

verminion.skill_description: Renders both ally and enemy Shields and Search Eyes inoperable. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

results.name: Wind-up Ravana
results.description: Summon your wind-up Ravana minion. Low on low he stands, gazing up to see.
results.enhanced_description: Desiring that the tale of Ravana's clash with the Warrior of Light be preserved for posterity, a Gnath historian commissioned the Weavers' Guild to recreate the Lord of the Hive as a mammet. Comes complete with Chandrahas and fierce love of battle.
results.tooltip: O Lord Ravana! Master of the Sacred Blades! Wrath of the Colony! Conqueror of the World!    - Gnath Priest

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Kojin
results.description: Summon your wind-up Kojin minion. Is it green? Is it blue? Or...is it neither?
results.enhanced_description: A mammet made in the likeness of the vessel for the kami Tsukumo, but given a green rather than blue coat of paint in order to differentiate it from the actual divinity. The Blue Kojin are hopeful of making a tidy profit by selling scores of these in Kugane.
results.tooltip: Tsukumo is no ordinary puppet. He is of the divine!    - Kabuto

sources.text: Shikitahe - Tamamizu (The Ruby Sea) - 5 Kojin Sango (Rank 5)

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

results.name: Axolotl Eft
results.description: Summon your axolotl eft minion. Because there truly is nothing more adorable than an oddly Lalafellin face on the body of a moist, frilled salamander.
results.enhanced_description: The retainer who reeled in this specimen claims it is the fabled hundred-eyed axolotl, but at a glance it is short at least ninety-eight. Nor would the man say where he found the creature. For now, it shall be called an “axolotl eft” until such time as naturalists decide what it actually is.
results.tooltip: The plot thickens like a dollop of salamander oil.    - Godbert

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Salt & Pepper Seal
results.description: Summon your salt & pepper seal minion. What a seal, what a mighty good seal.
results.enhanced_description: None can say how this seal pup came to be at Loch Seld, but the person who first saw it took to calling it “salt” for the briny water, then someone else came along and added “pepper,” because why not. The rest, as they say, is history.
results.tooltip: Love makes for the best seasoning.    - Gildon

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 70% of the maximum value.

results.name: Koala Joey
results.description: Summon your koala joey minion. Shows no signs of stress or crotch rot, so hug away.
results.enhanced_description: This small ursine creature dropped onto the retainer who was cutting down its tree and has apparently decided to see the world. Though ordinarily placid, it can be savage when threatened, and folk are cautioned against─ Awww, look at the adorable little critter!
results.tooltip: Fool is the man who calls a koala a bear within its hearing.    - Ancient Saying

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Mameshiba
results.description: Summon your mameshiba minion. Who let the newborn miniature Far Eastern canine specimen out? Who, who, who, who, who!?
results.enhanced_description: An unscrupulous merchant passed this pup off as a rare species of miniature dog known as the mameshiba. Such a thing does not exist. Rather than have the hapless owners discover the deception when it grows, it was trained to run away.
results.tooltip: There's a smile made of puppy fat!    - Delivery Moogle

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Ixion
results.description: Summon your wind-up Ixion minion. A horse is a horse, of course. Except when it is Ixion.
results.enhanced_description: In a bid to lure brave (or foolish) adventurers to hunt the legendary steed Ixion, the people of Gyr Abania pitched in coin to have this mammet produced─a handsome reward, they believe, for risking grisly death by impalement and/or lightning.
results.tooltip: Brave one! Your loyal steed awaits!    - Voyce

sources.text: Eschina - Rhalgr's Reach - 5 Ixion Horns (FATE "A Horse Outside" - The Lochs)

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Wind-up Matanga
results.description: Summon your wind-up Matanga minion. This is not Matanga. Matanga is graceful.
results.enhanced_description: A mammet made to resemble a Matanga found in the Hidden Canals of Uznair. Originally clothed, it was divested of its modesty by thieves targeting the jewels that adorned its lavish garments, hence its embarrassment. If only someone would cover up its shame. Shame. Shame.
results.tooltip: To think you beat a Matanga with just your fists.    - Impressed Dotharl

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Gosetsu
results.description: Summon your wind-up Gosetsu minion. Wanted by the Empire...and good little boys and girls across Othard.
results.enhanced_description: Crafted to honor Gosetsu─hero and leader of the oppressed peoples of Far Eastern Doma─this miniature replica is faithful down to the blademaster's sword, Samonji.
results.tooltip: Notorious fugitive wanted dead or alive by the Empire!    - Isse

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Lyse
results.description: Summon your wind-up Lyse minion. Most certainly not a repurposed wind-up Yda.
results.enhanced_description: Tataru's choice of raiment for this lifelike recreation of Ala Mhigo's newest heroine was, by no means, made with the sole intention of confusing the public into believing Lyse was a dancer by profession. Honest.
results.tooltip: It was brave of Lyse to remove her mask after so long...    - Alphinaud

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Namazu
results.description: Summon your wind-up Namazu minion. Half cat. Half fish. All fish.
results.enhanced_description: Not too many summers past, there wasn't a house in all Radz-at-Han that didn't echo with the pitter-patter of Hingan-made wind-up Namazu dolls, their misplaced eyes and bewhiskered lips the source of much mirth in the Near Eastern nation.
results.tooltip: He's not heavy, but gods, the smell...    - Lyse

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Exdeath
results.description: Summon your wind-up Exdeath minion. Most maniacal tree beings bent on world domination are usually not intimidated by turtles. This one is.
results.enhanced_description: Retrieved in the Deltascape, this full-metal automaton is a recreation of a terrible villain appearing in ancient legend. While its scintillant blue armor suggests the figure is a knight, Exdeath was believed to be a powerful warlock born from a tree.
results.tooltip: Death is but the blissful terminus of the lives of the weak.    - Nhazaa Jaab

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

results.name: Wind-up Bartz
results.description: Summon your wind-up Bartz minion. I like small Bartz and I cannot lie.
results.enhanced_description: The legend of Bartz and his trusty chocobo steed Boko is known far and wide, their journeys inspiring entire generations to adventure. Though, disagreement as to the appropriate spelling of the carefree youth's name has led to many a hurt butz.
results.tooltip: Since last we spoke, I've spent every spare moment at the butts.    - Barthovieu

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all enemies within range. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

results.name: Wind-up Red Mage
results.description: Summon your wind-up red mage minion. He'd rather be red than dead.
results.enhanced_description: Tales of mages dabbling in the schools of both black and white abound, but most end in the adept realizing that she should have focused on a single art rather than allowing hubris to drive her to believe that she might excel in both.
results.tooltip: A red mage must strive to achieve the greatest good.    - X'rhun Tia

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Magitek Avenger F1
results.description: Summon your magitek avenger F1 minion. Avenger, assembled!
results.enhanced_description: It appears the Empire created these faithful reproductions to train field engineers on how to repair actual avenger-class warmachina. The fact that the selfsame models are sold to imperial children as toys is a telling sign of the invaders' mindset.
results.tooltip: The desire to protect and the desire to avenge are opposing forces that can ill be reconciled.    - Alberic

verminion.skill_description:
Increases caster ATK by 10 and DEF by 5 for every 5% of HP lost.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Chimera
results.description: Summon your wind-up chimera minion. Crafted by piecing together the remnants of unsold automata.
results.enhanced_description: It is hard to imagine anyone taking pleasure in creating to-scale replicas of the very abominations that contributed to the end of an entire civilization. Then again, it is so utterly *adorable*.
results.tooltip: That chimera must be his latest prize.    - Hildibrand
