verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

results.name: Mock-up Grynewaht
results.description: Summon your mock-up Grynewaht minion. Bwahahahaha!
results.enhanced_description: This anatomically accurate simulacrum of the imperial soldier Grynewaht appears to have been built by magitek engineers to determine the most efficient means by which to incorporate magitek implants into the Roegadyn's body.
results.tooltip: It's like all my namedays have come at once!   - Grynewaht

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Khloe
results.description: Summon your wind-up Khloe minion. Because there is nothing wrong with a fully automated mechanical reconstruction of a young girl of three and ten summers.
results.enhanced_description: Ever since she began receiving them on her doorstep─one a day, every day, without fail─Khloe Aliapoh can't help but think there is something seriously wrong with whoever is sending her these disturbingly lifelike automata.
results.tooltip: This will make Khloe's best friend so happy!    - Khloe Aliapoh

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

results.name: Dress-up Yugiri
results.description: Summon your dress-up Yugiri minion. One Yugiri is never enough.
results.enhanced_description: Inspired by an automaton brought across the sea from faraway Aldenard, a Doman dollmaker set out to see if he could replicate the foreign techniques used to breathe life into the creation, the result being this fairly faithful rendition.
results.tooltip: Her name is Yugiri. Perchance you know of her?    - Ihanami

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Wind-up Lakshmi
results.description: Summon your wind-up Lakshmi minion. Your, your, your serpentine.
results.enhanced_description: Created to epitomize Lakshmi's flawless beauty, a certain minstrel prone to wandering flippantly deemed it “not to his liking,” ultimately driving the original craftsman to take his own life, and leaving his apprentice to hastily touch up the features.
results.tooltip: There isss naught She would not give.    - Sarisha

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **monster**).

results.name: Wind-up Susano
results.description: Summon your wind-up Susano minion. If the Kojin believe that within every item resides a deity, then who exactly resides inside this automaton?
results.enhanced_description: With an itsy Yata-no-Kagami in his left hand and a bitsy Ame-no-Murakumo in his right, one might almost forget the miniature Magatama throbbing wildly in this liliputian Lord of the Revel's breast. Almost.
results.tooltip: We are Susano, and in revelry do we rejoice!    - Lord of the Revel

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Bismarck
results.description: Summon your wind-up Bismarck minion. The hairiest whale you will see this fortnight.
results.enhanced_description: Seeing Limsa Lominsa crawling with wind-up Ifrits, Titans, Ramuhs, even Ravanas, the Bismarck proprietor wondered why there were still no automata designed in the likeness of his establishment's namesake, and so commissioned one made.
results.tooltip: The Bismarck is as good as mine.    - H'mhasi Tia

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

results.name: Wind-up Meateater
results.description: Summon your wind-up meateater minion. Watch out boys, he'll (literally) chew you up.
results.enhanced_description: This fully functioning automaton was discovered in the pack of a Qiqirn bandit slain on the Hunt. Why a Qiqirn was carrying a copy of itself on its person is a question you *could* ask yourself, but as they say, “ignorance is bliss.”
results.tooltip: Empty bellies send blood aboiling!    - Qiqirn Bandit

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

results.name: Road Sparrow
results.description: Summon your road sparrow minion. This house sparrow's home is on the road. Sparrow.
results.enhanced_description: Tired of his humdrum life back in Yanxia, this former house sparrow set off on the journey of a lifetime, finally arriving several moons later in Bardam's Mettle, where he fell in with a flock of ferocious yol and learned the true meaning of freedom.
results.tooltip: We will need wine...and sparrow-stuffed pheasant.    - Jannequinard

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Ghido
results.description: Summon your Ghido minion. There is most likely a logical explanation as to why this aged turtle can navigate the skies. Most likely.
results.enhanced_description: Some say this denizen of the Sirensong Sea has seen upwards of seven hundred summers, and in that time his hate for blue-blazoned armor has only grown. As for why, no one knows.
results.tooltip: Matron's teats, those turtles are huge!    - Waemlydir

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Odder Otter
results.description: Summon your odder otter minion. Is there anything odder than an otter who lives out of water?
results.enhanced_description: Otters of the Far East are highly cunning creatures, some scholars having ventured as far as to claim the rodents' intelligence is, in fact, comparable to that of a Qiqirn, despite lacking the latter's propensity for spoken communication.
results.tooltip: He seemed...odd. Well, odder than usual.    - Cocobezi

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **critters** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Bom Boko
results.description: Summon your Bom Boko minion. An adorable raccoon dog pup with a big heart and even bigger testicles.
results.enhanced_description: Supposedly Far Eastern raccoon dogs are nothing like the raccoons of Eorzea, shunning a life of rifling through garbage for one of transmogrification into everyday kitchenware such as tea crocks. Go figure.
results.tooltip: Now there's a trick what took some bollocks.    - Perimu Haurimu

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Tora-jiro
results.description: Summon your Tora-jiro minion. His name suggests that this tiny tiger cub has an older brother. His parents deny everything.
results.enhanced_description: Being saved by the selfsame hunter who brutally slayed your family for a sack of coin and a punny title can be awkward for a growing tiger cub. On one hand, he brutally slayed your family. On the other, he provides you bowls of rich, tasty cream.
results.tooltip: It has been too long since I last dined on tiger.    - Masatsuchi

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Fox Kit
results.description: Summon your fox kit minion. His devotion toward you will prove fair and balanced.
results.enhanced_description: Despite its appearance, this fox kit is actually the offspring of a thousand–year–old vulpine spirit yet incapable of taking on the body of a man that it may seduce its prey into relinquishing their very souls. Or not. There truly is no way to tell.
results.tooltip: The hungry fox starves staring at the bull's testicles.    - Cirina

sources.text: Eschina - Rhalgr's Reach - 3 Sassho-seki Fragments (FATEs "Outfoxed" and "Foxy Lady" - Yanxia)

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **critter**).

results.name: Ivon Coeurlfist Doll
results.description: Summon your Ivon Coeurlfist doll minion. Technically “Coeurl*paw*.”
results.enhanced_description: A complete dismantling of the coeurl-fisted caricature shows that, unlike the automata of Ul'dah, the puffered paunch of this poppet contains naught but cotton and straw, leading one to wonder...how in the seven hells does it walk!?
results.tooltip: He had a pair o' Sphairai crafted─fists what looked like coeurls.    - Gerolt

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Bombfish
results.description: Summon your bombfish minion. He will give you an offer that can't be defused.
results.enhanced_description: Given its name after a fisher claimed to witness the wavekin explode after tossing it on a grill, the bombfish is, in fact, neither related to bombs of voidsent origin or even that combustible.
results.tooltip: Won't get nowhere up its crack, yunz won't, not with that piddly bomb.    - 13th Order Alchemist Ga Zi

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 20.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Tiny Tatsunoko
results.description: Summon your tiny tatsunoko minion. If the Hingan word for sea horse is tatsunoko, would that make this a sea pony? *Your* little sea pony?
results.enhanced_description: A single ilm to the right or left and this cute creature would have been kebab. Fate, however, intervened, and now the wavekin follows its would-be transfixer─the tiny tyke having taken quite well to the upper world's drier climes.
results.tooltip: His tiny minions won't stand a chance!    - Haermaga

verminion.skill_description: Triggers an enemy trap as if it were your own. If the trap deals physical damage, then potency is increased by 150%.

results.name: Castaway Chocobo Chick
results.description: Summon your castaway chocobo chick minion. Currently without a name. “Wilson” recommended.
results.enhanced_description: You won't hear this from his beak, but the chocobo chick you rescued from the sea's slippery grasp cannot actually swim─the only thing keeping the bird afloat is a life preserver some kind sailor tossed from his ship before sailing off into the sunset.
results.tooltip: You can lead a chocobo to water...    - Redolent Rose

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 40%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Pegasus Colt
results.description: Summon your pegasus colt minion. Unfortunately does not emit rainbows from any of its orifices.
results.enhanced_description: Having lost his mother, this winged steed from the Diadem has settled upon a decidedly wingless bipedal surrogate to lead him somewhere over the rainbow.
results.tooltip: I still don't understand why a horn is so important to you.    - Ohl Deeh

verminion.skill_description:
Increases speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Baby Brachiosaur
results.description: Summon your baby brachiosaur minion.
results.enhanced_description: This adorable automaton was cobbled together by a sky pirate (who had once apprenticed as a goldsmith) after claiming to have spotted one of the mythical creatures from the deck of his crew's airship on a journey deep into the Diadem.
results.tooltip: Don't be a baby! Get a grip!    - Sisipu

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **poppets** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Wind-up Hraesvelgr
results.description: Summon your wind-up Hraesvelgr minion. Comes complete with overhead nameplate to help with spelling.
results.enhanced_description: An uncanny attention to detail has been paid in the creation of this automaton, commissioned to help Ishgardians remember a time when hate did not rule the hearts of man and dragon. This is especially true of Hraesvelgr's eyes in which can be seen both love and sadness.
results.tooltip: I somehow doubt that Hraesvelgr will be pleased to see us.    - Alphinaud

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Ishgard -The Scars of War-

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Faepup
results.description: Summon your faepup minion. Every dog has its fae.
results.enhanced_description: Whelped in the blackness of the void, and raised to be a proud and merciless killer, this deceptively adorable pup does not (obviously) take well to companionship. The rare exception, however, has been made for those who have shown they will not back down in fear.
results.tooltip: Pup that he is, having a trophy will mean much to him.    - Bloeidin

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

results.name: Hellpup
results.description: Summon your hellpup minion. Not all children are products of their environment. This one, however, is.
results.enhanced_description: Whelped in the blackness of the void, only to be abandoned by her mother, this hellpup survived by devouring the flesh of the litter's remaining hounds. Since then, she has wandered alone, searching for someone to love.
results.tooltip: Another wolf pup itchin' to get in the ring, are ye?    - Maelstrom Drill Sergeant

sources.text: Mama Said Knock You Out III

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Yuna
results.description: Summon your wind-up Yuna minion. “My will is strong!” So is this automaton's resistance to rust.
results.enhanced_description: Peoples of the Far East tell the tale of a beautiful summoner who embarked on a perilous journey to deliver restless souls to the afterlife and thus bring peace to the world. Her name was Yuna...
results.tooltip: I'm ready!    - Yuna

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

results.name: Wind-up Moon
results.description: Summon your wind-up moon minion. /poke to adjust elevation. /point to inform others of its location. /blowkiss to get strange looks from passersby.
results.enhanced_description: Following a report that excessive exposure to the bright light emitted by wind-up suns may be causing the very blemishes that Ul'dahn mesdames thought to hide, demand for a less-radiant alternative skyrocketed, ultimately giving rise to the wind-up moon.
results.tooltip: I am but the moon which reflects his radiance.    - Lebrassoir

sources.text: Magic Pot - The Isles of Umbra (Western La Noscea) - 1 Hi-Elixir

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **gadget**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Anima
results.description: Summon your anima minion. From your heart and from your hand. Finally people will understand your intentions.
results.enhanced_description: Ardashir fashioned this new body utilizing the anima's original soulstone. No longer limited to the immediate vicinity of the anima weapon, it is free to explore the realm at your side. Whether it will grow to become a real boy or girl, however, remains to be seen.
results.tooltip: The anima took on a corporeal form!?    - Ardashir

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Angel Of Mercy
results.description: Summon your angel of mercy minion. Come and save me tonight.
results.enhanced_description: A missing tinker has recently returned to Ul'dah claiming to have been “rescued by an angel.” While most believe the man to merely be a recipient of a passerby mage's kindness, he has since dedicated his life to creating automata in the image of his heavenly savior.
results.tooltip: *You* are the angel of beauty who gave me my life and stole away with my heart!    - Hortefense

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

results.name: Gigi
results.description: Summon your Gigi minion. Also known as Vivi...but his secret is safe with you.
results.enhanced_description: The secret to the lost art of temporal magicks is believed to be buried deep within this ancient automaton created by the legendary Sharlayan archmagus Quan. Vitality levels are dangerously low due to a power drainage necessary to save the lives of his companions.
results.tooltip: I daresay you have the potential to be an exemplary inspector someday!    - Hildibrand

sources.text: If I Could Turn Back Time

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 6% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Wind-up Nidhogg
results.description: Summon your wind-up Nidhogg minion. Now with more eyes.
results.enhanced_description: An enemy of the Holy See for over a thousand years, it is difficult for the people of Ishgard to not experience feelings of intense loathing when setting their eyes upon this harmless replica.
results.tooltip: Eternal is a dragon's rage, Dread Nidhogg's wrath did span an age.    - The Wandering Minstrel

sources.text: Item code included with The Far Edge of Fate Original Soundtrack

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Estinien
results.description: Summon your wind-up Estinien minion. Absolutely, positively not possessed by an evil dragon bent on ridding the world of mankind.
results.enhanced_description: It is said the creators of this lifelike replica spent several days quarreling over what color to paint the now-infamous dragoon's armor─blue or red. After consultation with Vault officials, the decision was made to proceed with the former.
results.tooltip: Estinien... You gave your word...    - Lady Iceheart

verminion.skill_description: Transports action party to the central summoning Gate.

results.name: Wind-up Ohl Deeh
results.description: Summon your wind-up Ohl Deeh minion. 100% less subject to violent mood swings than its living counterpart.
results.enhanced_description: This remarkably true-to-life replica of his bosom buddy Ohl Deeh was carefully handcrafted by Master Mogzin not as an expression of his undying friendship, but “to scare his wits all the way to Weston Waters.”
results.tooltip: Ohl Deeh, I was made to believe you could hurl boulders through the skies with but a flick of your powerful claws.    - Tarresson

sources.text: Mogmul Mogbelly - Bahrr Lehs (The Churning Mists) - 30,000 Gil (Rank 9)

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Scathach
results.description: Summon your wind-up Scathach minion. Surprisingly visible despite being a queen of the shadows.
results.enhanced_description: On the sole of her left foot can be seen the inscription, “With this, I profess my love to thee.” The lettering, however, does not match the Eorzean used during the latter Fourth Astral Era, suggesting that the automaton was crafted far after the fall of Mhach.
results.tooltip: If the Shadow Queen were to return, it would have dire consequences for this entire star!    - Cait Sith

verminion.skill_description: Knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Bullpup
results.description: Summon your bullpup minion. Runt of the canis pugnaces litter.
results.enhanced_description: The Garleans have a long history of canine breeding that extends far back into the nation's days as a republic. The intent of this practice is to produce fearless, loyal killing machines, and those that fail to display the desired traits are...discarded.
results.tooltip: He may be a pup, but he'll likely make a meal of anyone what gets close to him.    - R'kontai

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **monsters**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Lulu
results.description: Summon your wind-up Lulu minion. “Magic has no limits.” Nor does the list of exciting things you can do with this automaton.
results.enhanced_description: Peoples of the Far East tell the tale of a powerful mage and master of puppets who would rain destruction down on any that might harm her companions as they made their journey to save the world. Her name was Lulu...
results.tooltip: Let's see how tough you are.    - Lulu

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Rikku
results.description: Summon your wind-up Rikku minion. “Victory is ours!” This automaton is yours.
results.enhanced_description: Peoples of the Far East tell the tale of a plucky young lass with a fiery heart and questionable taste in finery who accompanied a summoner on her journey to bring peace to the world. That young lass's name was Rikku...
results.tooltip: Bring it on!    - Rikku

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Namingway
results.description: Summon your Namingway minion. Do not think this means you can now change your character name.
results.enhanced_description: While it is whispered that this cheerful vagrant is the sole surviving member of a tribe hailing from none other than the moon, most see Namingway for who he is─a queer fellow with a penchant for giving all he meets absurd nicknames then jotting them down in his mysterious journal.
results.tooltip: I do not expect all moogles to be well versed in Roegadyn naming conventions.    - Klynthota

sources.text: Item code included with Encyclopaedia Eorzea

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Edda
results.description: Summon your wind-up Edda minion. Because true love never dies.
results.enhanced_description: While not confirmed, it is thought this eerily lifelike replica of Edda Blackbosom was created by a former companion of the now-deceased(?) adventurer. Those who have possessed the dark fetish assert that its hair grows at night when no one is looking.
results.tooltip: Edda, you're so slow, you'd lose a footrace to a tree slug.    - Liavinne

sources.text: The Palace of the Dead - Iron/Silver/Gold Sack

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Wind-up Moenbryda
results.description: Summon your wind-up Moenbryda minion. Destined to die a hero...and live on as a mechanized servitor.
results.enhanced_description: This finely detailed tribute to Moenbryda was crafted in secret by none other than Urianger following the untimely passing of his beloved companion. Though known for her warm and jovial nature, the resolve within this doll's eyes perhaps speaks to the strength he admired in her.
results.tooltip: I shall allow no foe to harm the lovely Moenbryda.    - Thancred

sources.text: An Ending to Mark a New Beginning

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 50%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

results.name: Dress-up Alisaie
results.description: Summon your dress-up Alisaie minion. Now 120% more discernable from the wind-up Alphinaud minion.
results.enhanced_description: After finding that she could simply not tell her wind-up Alisaie and Alphinaud automata apart, Tataru went about modifying the former's garments, creating something both new and bold...all while keeping manufacturing costs at an absolute minimum!
results.tooltip: Is it just my imagination, or is Alisaie staring daggers at me?    - Alphinaud

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 40.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Dress-up Thancred
results.description: Summon your dress-up Thancred minion. Take a walk on Thancred's wild side...but with fewer nutkins.
results.enhanced_description: Several moons in the wild, removed from civilization and forced to adopt a more bestial means of survival transformed not only Thancred's body, but his mind. Due to the limitations of clockwork technology, this automaton only depicts those changes to the former.
results.tooltip: I say, did you not see Thancred anywhere? I'm beginning to fear for the fellow...    - Papalymo

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Toy Alexander
results.description: Summon your toy Alexander minion. A special something for all good Illuminati gobs and girls.
results.enhanced_description: At first dismissed as a quaint oddity, it has recently been discovered that the Illuminati use this fully functional replica of the primal Alexander to educate young goblins in the fields of metallurgy and engineering.
results.tooltip: From what I understand, this “Alexander” was active for no more than a few seconds.    - Biggs

sources.text: Alexander - The Soul Of The Creator
Alexander - The Soul Of The Creator (Savage)

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **monster**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Shaggy Shoat
results.description: Summon your shaggy shoat minion. This adorable piglet will gore your heart and leave you yearning for more.
results.enhanced_description: The orphaned offspring of one of the many wild boars that inhabit the deep ravines of Xelphatol. Having lost its mother, the tiny beast seeks someone of unmatched strength and boundless courage to teach it the ways of survival. Until that someone is found, you will do most nicely.
results.tooltip: He is a giant amongst boars, unrivaled in strength and savagery, and ruler over all his kind.    - Ywain

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (30 if the ally is a **critter**).
**Duration:** 9s

results.name: Continental Eye
results.description: Summon your Continental eye minion. I see you. You see me.
results.enhanced_description: Cursed with a weak vessel upon its arrival in the corporeal realm, this malformed and maladroit voidsent was summarily captured and put to work at the Continental Circus...until being sold for a handful of coin to a new owner─you.
results.tooltip: The business of which I speak involves keeping an eye on that troublesome troupe of entertainers.    - Godriquelain

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

results.name: USApyon
results.description: Summon your USApyon minion. A Yo-kai who aims for the moon.
results.enhanced_description: A Yo-kai from across the sea, USApyon hopes to someday venture into space. He uses Vader mode when he is angry.
results.tooltip: Shoot!

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Robonyan F-type
results.description: Summon your Robonyan F-type minion. It's an upgraded robot that thinks it's a cat.
results.enhanced_description: An upgraded model of Robonyan, he removed all of his unnecessary functions to become the perfect robot cat.
results.tooltip: Activating Sleep Mode...

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all enemies within range. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

results.name: Hovernyan
results.description: Summon your Hovernyan minion. He may be a wanderer, but he's actually quite dependable.
results.enhanced_description: Although he is floating, he is actually very down-to-earth. The white mark on his forehead is an honorable battle scar.
results.tooltip: I've got your back!

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Shogunyan
results.description: Summon your Shogunyan minion. This legendary warrior's armor smells faintly of tuna.
results.enhanced_description: This Yo-kai is Jibanyan's legendary warrior ancestor. He just loves skipjack tuna and carries it around in his armor.
results.tooltip: Heart of a Warrior!

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Venoct
results.description: Summon your Venoct minion. All of his abilities are truly first class.
results.enhanced_description: An elite Yo-kai who fights with his dragon scarf.
results.tooltip: Hmph...!

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Noko
results.description: Summon your Noko minion. This Yo-kai is one lucky snake!
results.enhanced_description: Noko is always scared of being seen by humans. Which happens a lot, since it's terrible at hiding.
results.tooltip: Noko noko!

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **monster**).

results.name: Manjimutt
results.description: Summon your Manjimutt minion. He hopes to become a CEO someday.
results.enhanced_description: A man-faced poodle who enjoys scaring people frightened by a poodle with a man's face.
results.tooltip: Doggone it!

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Komajiro
results.description: Summon your Komajiro minion. He might as well tag along on your adventures as he searches for his older brother.
results.enhanced_description: Komajiro is Komasan's younger twin. He looks for his runaway brother, but he can't find him anywhere.
results.tooltip: Oh my swirls!

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Kyubi
results.description: Summon your Kyubi minion. He's actually quite charming once you get to know him.
results.enhanced_description: This fox Yo-kai is one of the strongest Yo-kai around. He can easily erupt with power, like a volcano.
results.tooltip: How ridiculous.

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Blizzaria
results.description: Summon your Blizzaria minion. She's a Yo-kai with an immense chilling power.
results.enhanced_description: A Yo-kai with the power to make temperatures drop, Blizzaria can make snow fall in summer and freeze volcanoes.
results.tooltip: Summer fever...

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **monster**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Whisper
results.description: Summon your Whisper minion. Your very own Yo-kai butler, at your service.
results.enhanced_description: A self-proclaimed “Yo-kai butler.” With the way he talks, you would think him a know-it-all, but he is really a know-nothing.
results.tooltip: Hold on to your butler!

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Komasan
results.description: Summon your Komasan minion. He got bored with guarding his shrine. Now he wants to guard you.
results.enhanced_description: Komasan is a lion-dog that came from a rural area. He often expresses awe when traveling in the city.
results.tooltip: Oh my swirls!

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Jibanyan
results.description: Summon your Jibanyan minion. He might take his anger out on passing vehicles.
results.enhanced_description: After being run over, Jibanyan was bound to a busy crossroad where he spent his days taking revenge on any passing vehicle that stood in his way.
results.tooltip: I'm kind of busy right nyao.

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Krile
results.description: Summon your wind-up Krile minion. She is terribly, terribly sorry to have kept you waiting.
results.enhanced_description: This clockwork contraption has been crafted at the behest of the Adventurers' Guild in celebration of the Rising, Eorzea's annual celebration of rebirth. The enormous feline ears attached to her hood are thought to represent Krile's ability to hear the whispers of the soul.
results.tooltip: Would you care to attempt a more dextrous deflection?    - Krile

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Dress-up Y'shtola
results.description: Summon your dress-up Y'shtola minion. Now with more aetheric...enhancements?
results.enhanced_description: This clockwork automaton has been crafted at the behest of the Adventurers' Guild in celebration of the Rising, Eorzea's annual celebration of rebirth. Alphinaud Leveilleur was apparently more than happy to submit a rough sketch for the design, despite never being asked.
results.tooltip: Tataru has truly outdone herself this time.    - Y'shtola

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **critters**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Hecteye
results.description: Summon your hecteye minion. Got no Hyuran grace, you're an eye without a face.
results.enhanced_description: This single optic detached from a larger mass of hecteyes finds itself in a constant state of restlessness, given the inability to simultaneously survey its surroundings in all directions. Until it grows more, your eyes will have to suffice.
results.tooltip: I keep one eye open at all times, an' two more often than not.    - Baderon

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Sasquatch
results.description: Summon your wind-up sasquatch minion. It thankfully cannot pelt you with its steaming stool.
results.enhanced_description: Crafted by the Leatherworkers' Guild, this lifelike clockwork replica of a sasquatch is hoped to bring attention to the creatures' dwindling numbers in the wild.
results.tooltip: I've decided to follow in your footsteps.    - Sisipu

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

results.name: Piggy
results.description: Summon your Piggy minion. Many have tried casting Esuna on what they thought was a struggling adventurer, only to find they had wasted their magic.
results.enhanced_description: A mysterious bipedal swine given away as a prize after it was discovered gorging itself in the Manderville Gold Saucer kitchens. Assuming he is not a real pig, many have tried poking, unmasking, and dispelling the portly pork's guise...but to no avail.
results.tooltip: The sultana's pigs've come to wallow!    - Gisfrid the Grinder

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

results.name: Magic Bucket
results.description: Summon your magic bucket minion. A fisherman's best friend. He sloshes instead of slobbers.
results.enhanced_description: This curiosity is said to have once belonged to an angler who wanted a bottomless pail that would shadow him hither and yon. Upon releasing a live Nepto Dragon into the markets, he had a change of heart and tossed the bucket back brinewards, never looking back.
results.tooltip: Throw back a guppy today, and reel in ten fish tomorrow.    - N'nmulika

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Cheerleader
results.description: Summon your wind-up cheerleader minion. Oh, I think that you've found yourself a cheerleader.
results.enhanced_description: Commissioned by officers stationed in the Wolves' Den, the cheerleader was designed to enkindle the spirits of the arena's competitors. Some have noticed, however, that if a match begins to stagnate, her chants devolve from little lady cheers into Lominsan sailor jeers.
results.tooltip: Oh, do cheer up. Better to die once than live ever in shame.    - Hunt Billmaster

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Aymeric
results.description: Summon your wind-up Aymeric minion. His many obligations prevent him from accompanying you on your journeys, but hopefully this dutiful substitute will suffice.
results.enhanced_description: Noting the popularity of other clockwork leaders, the Temple Knights attempted to make one of their own beloved commander. The face was so far-removed from the true Aymeric's handsome mien, however, that one of the knights' wives volunteered to sew a new one from scratch.
results.tooltip: A divided Ishgard will not survive.    - Aymeric

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

results.name: Wind-up Shiva
results.description: Summon your wind-up Shiva minion. Renounce the hatreds that consume you, and she will scatter them like sawdust into the wind.
results.enhanced_description: When followers of Iceheart heard the Weavers' Guild was creating clockwork effigies, they made the long trek from Ishgard to commission one in the likeness of Saint Shiva. However, the final product was so endearing, they puzzled over whether to pay it solemn tribute or cuddle it.
results.tooltip: Is it I who am elated... or Saint Shiva?    - Ysayle

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Ramuh
results.description: Summon your wind-up Ramuh minion. He's silently judging you.
results.enhanced_description: While Garuda-themed automata flew from the shelves of the Shaded Bower, the Weavers' Guild had already begun work on another local primal. Sylphs were interviewed regarding Ramuh's wizened visage, but none could agree on the length and fullness of his beard.
results.tooltip: By the radiance of eld be thee judged!    - Ramuh

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Dragonet
results.description: Summon your wind-up dragonet minion. For the adventurer who has always longed to be a mother of dragons.
results.enhanced_description: After learning of Ishgardian artistry, the Moghome moogles' first endeavor was to create a wind-up automaton similar. A plucky dragonet named Kal Myhk volunteered to serve as the model, and even offered some of his scales to provide it a more lifelike texture.
results.tooltip: Mother asks that I hunt, but I have never dared to hunt alone.    - Kal Myhk

sources.text: Mogmul Mogbelly - Bahrr Lehs (The Churning Mists) - 30,000 Gil (Rank 7)

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Dwarf Rabbit
results.description: Summon your dwarf rabbit minion. He may have a penchant for nibbling at your neighbor's garden patches.
results.enhanced_description: After his father was baked into a pie by a farmer's wife for stealing their vegetables, he invoked the time-honored code of rabbit revenge and hopped off to destroy every garden patch he could find.
results.tooltip: But know that she who chases two rabbits catches neither one.    - J'moldva

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 10 to all enemies within range every second.
**Duration:** 20s
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Calofisteri
results.description: Summon your wind-up Calofisteri minion. She seems so peaceful. Why don't you keep her with you...FOR ALL ETERNITY!
results.enhanced_description: This clockwork creation is similar to others made by a deranged Gridanian goldsmith, whose body went missing after he was executed for conjuring the dark arts. Found in the remnants of the city of Mhach, an explorer swore he could hear cackling from behind the crumbling walls.
results.tooltip: By the blood of voidsent have I ascended to the sublime...     - Calofisteri

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Calamari
results.description: Summon your calamari minion. (Or is it a trap!?)
results.enhanced_description: Academics visiting Hullbreaker Isle determined, upon discovery of this strange creature, this tiny tentacle is a regenerating arm of a slain kraken. Unlike the hostile body from which it was severed, it bears you no ill will. Rather, this appendage seems to have taken a liking to you...
results.tooltip: RELEASE THE KRAKEN!    - Captain Madison

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Doman Magpie
results.description: Summon your Doman magpie minion. Approximately 3.14159 times more intelligent than the average swallow.
results.enhanced_description: Magpies have historically been portrayed as loyal messengers of Menphina, bearing the word of the Lover's favor in war. There are some generals even today who will wait to advance their armies until one of the birds has been sighted on their side of the battlefield.
results.tooltip: Fancy some feathers... bird brain?    - Gilgamesh

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Panda Cub
results.description: Summon your panda cub minion. Untrained in arts both martial and magical, but as scrumptiously adorable as chicken glazed in a tangy orange reduction.
results.enhanced_description: So popular are pandas in the Far East, that there are tales of the creatures being promoted to powerful positions within local governmental agencies. This particular mechanical reproduction is thought to have been brought to Eorzea by a Doman wise man.
results.tooltip: Beings held as gods also exist in what you call the Far East.   - Yugiri

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Spoony Bard
results.description: Summon your spoony bard minion. Although there are many different accounts of what was actually said during the famous altercation, all agree on the single utterance that became his legacy.
results.enhanced_description: This colorfully outfitted automaton was crafted to resemble the legendary Edward Chris von Muir. The proud descendant of a peerless bard, it was said Edward's voice could unravel the very fabric of magic. The prince of a lost kingdom, he stood against darkness in the name of love.
results.tooltip: You spoony bard!     - Tellah

sources.text: Item code included with Heavensward Original Soundtrack

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 20.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Nero Tol Scaeva
results.description: Summon your wind-up Nero tol Scaeva minion. Better engineered than the wind-up Cid. In every way.
results.enhanced_description: This automaton incorporates a special mechanism that allows it to grip its weapon more effectively. This revolutionary innovation puts it above any wind-up toy currently in production, especially those crafted by the Garlond Ironworks.
results.tooltip: If it were up to me, I'd lock him up and throw the key into Silvertear Lake.     - Biggs

verminion.skill_description: Triggers an enemy trap as if it were your own. If the trap deals physical damage, then potency is increased by 150%.

results.name: Wind-up Leviathan
results.description: Summon your wind-up Leviathan minion. Your flesh cannot feed this minion of the deep.
results.enhanced_description: Following the release of their wind-up Titan, the Weavers' Guild once again approached Trachtoum for consultation─a task to which he eagerly “rose,” providing the guild with a crude sketch of a certain body part he insists is identical in length and girth to “the” Leviathan.
results.tooltip: Leviathan's scaly arse!     - Wilfalk

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 90%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

results.name: Wind-up Titan
results.description: Summon your wind-up Titan minion. Placing this puppet on an elevated surface may compel it to knock everything else to the ground.
results.enhanced_description: The second in the Weavers' Guild's popular series of primal automata. The guild consulted with Trachtoum─a master axeman from the Company of Heroes─whose firsthand account of his battle against “Tidus” formed the basis of this true-to-life design.
results.tooltip: Aye, we defeated him─in the end─but he took from us some of our very best.     - Wheiskaet

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Garuda
results.description: Summon your wind-up Garuda minion. Hopefully she will not HEEHEE haha HEEE!!! too loudly in your ear.
results.enhanced_description: Understandably, many in Gridania opposed the manufacture of an automaton depicting the Ixal's chosen primal. However, since the publication of an article in *The Raven* espousing the puppet's efficacy as a good-luck charm, production can barely keep up with demand.
results.tooltip: Heehee HAHA hahaha HEEHEE haha HEEEEEE!!!     - Garuda

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

results.name: Wind-up Gnath
results.description: Summon your wind-up Gnath minion. <click> <click> He will obey.
results.enhanced_description: The designer of this automaton chose to convey the Gnath's utter devotion to the Onemind through its facial expression, and went to great efforts to craft a countenance that conveyed a lack of individuality. However, for most, the color of its clothing says enough.
results.tooltip: Return to the colony. Rejoin. *Repent*.     - The Overmind

sources.text: Vath Stickpeddler - Loth ast Vath (The Dravanian Forelands) - 30,000 Gil (Rank 7)

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 20.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Vath
results.description: Summon your wind-up Vath minion. <click> <click> He seeks purpose. So he will follow you. Everywhere.
results.enhanced_description: The idea for this design came when a Vath observed an automaton following on the heels of a fleshling he encountered. So impressed was the Vath by the gadget's intricacy that he endeavored to create his own, after which he started calling himself “Needleclaw.”
results.tooltip: We are not of the Onemind. We are Vath!     - The Nameless One

sources.text: Vath Stickpeddler - Loth ast Vath (The Dravanian Forelands) - 30,000 Gil (Rank 4)

verminion.skill_description:
Increases the movement speed of the action party by 30%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Faustlet
results.description: Summon your faustlet minion. He will shelter you from the sturms.
results.enhanced_description: The Illuminati reportedly designed this minute automaton for the purpose of testing the effectiveness of their newest weapons. Perhaps being used as target practice has filled it with the need to lash out against imagined enemies.
results.tooltip: It's only a massive mammet, after all.     - Cid

sources.text: Alexander - The Burden Of The Son (Savage)

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 380 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Fenrir Pup
results.description: Summon your Fenrir pup minion. This stray hoarhound pup is as feisty as the leader of his pack, and just as aloof.
results.enhanced_description: Torn from his mother's teat immediately after birth and weaned on the manblood spilled daily in the Wolves' Den, this young hoarhound with soft blue fur was named after the spirit-beast of legend with hopes that he would grow to become as fierce and powerful.
results.tooltip: Wolves. Swivin' wolves...     - Hundred Eyes

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **monster**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Poro Roggo
results.description: Summon your Poro Roggo minion. Enchanted familiar though it may be, kissing it will do nothing to alter its corporeal form.
results.enhanced_description: A product of Matoya's mind-altering magicks, this particular familiar served the mistress for almost fifty summers before becoming struck with a sense of wanderlust following several fetch quests into the wild. Matoya allowed it to accompany you on your journey.
results.tooltip: Indeed, there is no end to the tasks that want for doing, ribbit.     - Toro Roggo

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Morpho
results.description: Summon your morpho minion. With blue wings practically glowing, this butterfly feels almost like a spirit. Almost.
results.enhanced_description: The wings of this butterfly were highly sought after during the War of the Magi, as their scales could be used to make poison that inhibited the restoration of magical energy. As a result, they were hunted to near extinction, and now very few remain.
results.tooltip: The War of the Magi must have been a conflict of truly terrifying proportions.     - E-Sumi-Yan

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 30s

results.name: Brina
results.description: Summon your Brina minion. Collectors warn that one who wishes to complete the set should be well versed in the art of combat.
results.enhanced_description: Tasked to defend the Antitower along with Calca, Brina scurried off to the safety of a treasure coffer after meeting defeat at the hands of adventurers. Impressed that anyone could uncover its hiding place, Brina decided to make itself a gift to the adventurer who found it.
results.tooltip: Adorable dolls! Terrible dolls! Yip-ho-ho!     - Calcabrina

verminion.skill_description:
Increases the ATK of all allies within range by 20. If Calca is within range, ATK is raised by 60.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Calca
results.description: Summon your Calca minion. Whether she is cute or creepy has been oft debated, but all agree it is best not to leave her to her own devices.
results.enhanced_description: Upon realizing the Antitower would require several layers of defenses to keep out unwanted visitors, the spire's creator breathed life into several common dolls. Hairless at first, its maker adorned it with blonde locks, along with other aesthetically pleasing accessories.
results.tooltip: Adorable dolls! Terrible dolls! Yip-ho-ho!     - Calcabrina

verminion.skill_description:
Increases the DEF of all allies within range by 10. If Brina is within range, DEF is raised by 40.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Relm
results.description: Summon your wind-up Relm minion. Come on now, you stubborn old bag of bones!
results.enhanced_description: This automaton was crafted to resemble one of the characters appearing in an ancient Eorzean faerie tale. In the story, a young girl named Relm is able to conjure the images of great beasts simply by sketching them─a feature this doll unfortunately lacks.
results.tooltip: Snap out of it!    - Relm

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Ishgard -Stone and Steel-

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Haurchefant
results.description: Summon your wind-up Haurchefant minion. What isn't dead (or is recreated in a goldsmith's workshop) can never die.
results.enhanced_description: Crafted by the first son of House Haillenarte to honor the passing of one of House Fortemps's greatest knights, this miniature replica of the great Haurchefant Greystone only begins to tell the tale of a man who devoted his life to the service of his nation and his friends.
results.tooltip: Lord Haurchefant is, from all indications, quite fond of you.    - Discomposed Cataloger

sources.text: As Goes Light, So Goes Darkness

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Wind-up Ifrit
results.description: Summon your wind-up Ifrit minion. It doesn't bleed. You cannot kill it. (But you may discard it at your leisure.)
results.enhanced_description: To celebrate your slaying of the fell primal, the Weavers' Guild crafted scores of these lifelike replicas which were, much to the chagrin of Ul'dah's youth, immediately snatched up by wealthy collectors and locked away for no one to see.
results.tooltip: Ifrit's fiery piss! Just how many of these damned rogues are there!?    - Quimperain

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Zundu Warrior
results.description: Summon your wind-up Zundu warrior minion. Like a spring wind, the Zundu warrior is strong...until he winds down.
results.enhanced_description: A sign of friendship between the Zundu and Gundu tribes, this animated doll was created using a myriad of sacred items enchanted by an elder shaman. It is unclear how, without clockwork, the warrior can walk on its own, but its maker remains silent on the techniques he employed.
results.tooltip: Like the most precious of crystals, Gundu culture possesses many facets.    - Sonu Vanu

sources.text: Luna Vanu - Ok' Gundu Nakki (The Sea of Clouds) - 30,000 Gil (Rank 7)

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Gundu Warrior
results.description: Summon your wind-up Gundu warrior minion. He weighs far less than he appears.
results.enhanced_description: Created by a Gundu shaman using techniques similar to those employed to craft battle totems, this animated doll contains no wheels or gears, but is rather propelled by an ancient Gundu enchantment known only to a handful of village elders.
results.tooltip: Like breeze guides leaves to rest, come and lay down your burdens, netherlings!    - Lonu Vanu

sources.text: Luna Vanu - Ok' Gundu Nakki (The Sea of Clouds) - 30,000 Gil (Rank 4)

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 40.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Wind-up Illuminatus
results.description: Summon your wind-up Illuminatus minion. Comes complete with two hands, both blue as an Illuminati baby's bum.
results.enhanced_description: Originally conceived by Illuminati machinists as a means of displaying their society's scientific superiority, the schematics for this automaton were stolen along with the secret recipe for goblin cheese during Brayflox's now legendary raid of an Illuminati stronghold.
results.tooltip: Illuminati can never be trusted.    - Backrix

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Penguin Prince
results.description: Summon your penguin prince minion. An empire awaits.
results.enhanced_description: This emperor penguin fledgling dreams of one day ruling his own empire and has set off on a journey to seek the loyal subjects who will make up his imperial court. Or at least that is what the Gold Saucer attendant who found the flightless cloudkin claims.
results.tooltip: I am no prince! I am but the privileged brat of an...empire!    - Tataramu

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 10 every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Hunting Hawk
results.description: Summon your hunting hawk minion. She loves you more than life itself. She's had to.
results.enhanced_description: After losing her master, this raptor expertly trained in the art of falconry wandered the skies in search of purpose, finally arriving in the Diadem where she has since awaited the arrival of one worthy to lead her once more into the field to pursue new quarry.
results.tooltip: Our companions gliding proudly through the skies will be as they always have and always will be.    - Josseloux

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK by all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Wind-up Echidna
results.description: Summon your wind-up Echidna minion. A remarkably lifelike recreation of the shape-shifting seductress. Perhaps a tad *too* lifelike...
results.enhanced_description: Possibly one of countless clockwork servitors crafted by a Gridanian goldsmith whose body went missing after being hanged for the crime of ritual summoning. Upon the doll's back is carved the following: “And in the endless darkness I found her. Or was it she found me?”
results.tooltip: Advances in Mhachi sorcery were made for one reason only: cataclysmic destructive power.    - Cait Sith

verminion.skill_description: Renders both ally and enemy Shields and Search Eyes inoperable. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

results.name: Clockwork Twintania
results.description: Summon your clockwork Twintania minion. Another advanced Allagan creation. Is there anything the Allagans couldn't create? The Allagans are believed to have created an instrument to answer this very question.
results.enhanced_description: Despite being thousands of years old, this Allagan-crafted machina still runs as if it were activated yesterday. Tomestone analysis reveals that the automaton was created to celebrate the empire's subjugation of Meracydian territories across the Rhotano Sea.
results.tooltip: Do a barrel roll!    - A Slippy Scalekin

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **monster**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Korpokkur Kid
results.description: Summon your korpokkur kid minion. For best results, keep moist at all times.
results.enhanced_description: Before their exodus back to the Old World, Sharlayan botanists conducted extensive studies on korpokkurs at Saint Mocianne's Arboretum. In their haste, the scientists left behind several samples which have, over the past decades, continued to thrive and reproduce...
results.tooltip: Feels so soft and moist as fresh spring shower!    - Ranu Vali

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 10 every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Shalloweye
results.description: Summon your shalloweye minion. Please refrain from staring.
results.enhanced_description: While most scholars of the void place deepeyes on the twelfth and final rung of voidsent hierarchy, it has been documented that the stronger the creature the deepeye possesses upon plane crossover, the more power the specimen may exert while within our realm.
results.tooltip: They're perfect for scrubbing the soot from this statue.    - Thierremont

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Paissa Brat
results.description: Summon your paissa brat minion. The eyes of a newborn paissa are said to see only the truth. The truth and food.
results.enhanced_description: In addition to being quite tasty, paissas are often bred by Vanu tribes for fighting. One such creature was given as a gift to the Rose Knights when the Ishgardians were still on good terms with the Sea of Clouds natives...and then subsequently lost in a card game.
results.tooltip: Even cowardly paissa cannot hide forever!    - Gundu Warrior

sources.text: The Palace of the Dead - Bronze Sack

verminion.skill_description:
Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eye impervious to damage.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Wind-up Firion
results.description: Summon your wind-up Firion minion. Free is a very good price.
results.enhanced_description: The craftsmanship used in creating this clockwork automaton is far more impressive than anything you have ever seen...which poses the question: why would anyone part with the doll without asking anything in return?
results.tooltip: I can't believe he's just giving them away free of charge, kupo!    - Mogzun

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 13%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Yugiri
results.description: Summon your wind-up Yugiri minion, her mask no longer holding any mystery.
results.enhanced_description: In an effort to see his skills remain sharp, a displaced Doman dollmaker now working in the crystal quarries near Revenant's Toll spends his nights crafting wind-up automata, Yugiri serving as his sole model.
results.tooltip: She's *really* good at hide-and-seek, too!    - Koharu

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Pumpkin Butler
results.description: Summon your Pumpkin Butler minion. Oft-forgotten member of the Mandragoras, if the Pumpkin Butler harbors any ill will for those who have so easily forsaken him, he does a fine job of hiding it.
results.enhanced_description: Unhappy with his treatment in the Tomato King's court, the Pumpkin Butler fled his place of longtime servitude only to wind up in the hands of the Continental Circus. Here, he worked twice as hard until an Adventurers' Guild investigator freed him once and for all.
results.tooltip: Pumpkins sort of remind me of...um... No, it's gone. Never mind!    - Nashu Mhakaracca

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Wind-up Iceheart
results.description: Summon your wind-up Iceheart minion. Too hot to handle, too cold to hold.
results.enhanced_description: The brainchild of one of Lady Iceheart's fanatical followers, this lifelike automaton was to be sold in Ishgardian toy shoppes under the name “Ice Princess” with hopes of secretly indoctrinating young children in the ways of the heretics.
results.tooltip: Whether it takes days, weeks, moons, or even years, my knights will find her.    - Aymeric

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Wind-up Tataru
results.description: Summon your wind-up Tataru minion and prepare to have your heart melt.
results.enhanced_description: A routine inspection of Scion spending ledgers uncovered an order placed for ten score automata crafted in Tataru's image. When probed about the unauthorized use of organization funds for personal use, the receptionist merely smiled and struck an adorable pose.
results.tooltip: Hmm. Tataru has ever been full of surprises.    - Minfilia

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Wind-up Alisaie
results.description: Summon your wind-up Alisaie minion. For those who believe the better half deserves more time in the spotlight.
results.enhanced_description: In an attempt to cover the financial losses suffered when creating three score thousand wind-up Alphinauds, the Crystal Braves treasurer took it upon himself to simply swap the mammet's hair bows and rebrand the dolls as wind-up Alisaies.
results.tooltip: For the future of Eorzea!   - Alisaie (and Alphinaud)

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Steam-powered Gobwalker G-VII
results.description: Summon your steam-powered gobwalker G-VII minion. Exhaust can be used to steam hams.
results.enhanced_description: This tiny machine is a prototype for the newest model of steam-powered warmachina being mass-produced by the fanatical goblin academics known as the Illuminati. Over a thousand crabs were caught, studied, and subsequently devoured to perfect the current design.
results.tooltip: Spill bladder not over unstrong firebooms of Illuminati!    - Brayflox

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 60%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

results.name: Wind-up Kain
results.description: Summon your wind-up Kain minion. A few moments may be needed to allow him to regain control of himself.
results.enhanced_description: The tale of Kain─the dragoon who abandoned his duty for honor─is well known amongst Ishgardian children. To maximize the height on his jumps, the craftsman of this clockwork automaton lined the main control springs with over-aspected wind crystals.
results.tooltip: It's all right. I...I'm back in control of myself.    - Kain

verminion.skill_description:
Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eye impervious to damage.
**Duration:** 20s

results.name: Clockwork Barrow
results.description: Summon your clockwork barrow minion and take a load off your shoulders.
results.enhanced_description: This self-propelled handcart was purchased from the Oak Atrium as a prize for the Greatloam Growery's gysahl green growing contest. The cart, however, was never awarded, for on the final day of the competition, it was discovered vilekin had devoured all the entries.
results.tooltip: May Zo Ga singe his arse on what's left of the wain!    - Craftsman Bo Gu

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **gadget**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Gold Rush Minecart
results.description: Summon your gold rush minecart minion. It is, unsurprisingly, void of gold.
results.enhanced_description: Unbeknownst to their clients, retainers across Eorzea have been secretly using these automated minecarts to help haul about all the materials adventurers have them venture forth to collect. As of yet, however, no adventurer has reported receiving a “rush of gold.”
results.tooltip: But I don't want to work in the silver mines!    - Gold Saucer Patron

sources.text: FATE "On Dangerous Ground" - The Sea of Clouds

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

results.name: Accompaniment Node
results.description: Summon your accompaniment node minion and marvel at the advanced accompaniment technology of the Allagan Empire.
results.enhanced_description: Constructed by Ironworks handyman Wedge solely of parts retrieved from a deactivated Azys Lla guidance node, this refurbished machina retains none of the guidance capabilities present in the original.
results.tooltip: To proceed, please agree to the terms and conditions of use.    - Guidance Node

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 70%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Heliodor Carbuncle
results.description: Summon your Heliodor Carbuncle minion. If ever unfaithful, return for a full refund.
results.enhanced_description: The pain of being unable to summon her own Topaz Carbuncle still fresh in her heart, Tataru vowed she would never again be discouraged by her own failures and commissioned the Goldsmiths' Guild to craft her an ever-loyal companion. The furry outer shell is a Tataru original.
results.tooltip: I hope to...create a new variety of Carbuncle, perhaps.    - Alphinaud

sources.text: Item code included with Topaz Carbuncle Plushie

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Peridot Carbuncle
results.description: Summon your Peridot Carbuncle minion. If ever unfaithful, return for a full refund.
results.enhanced_description: The pain of being betrayed by her first summoned pet still fresh in her heart, Tataru vowed she would never again fall victim to the whims of a fickle familiar and commissioned the Goldsmiths' Guild to craft her an ever-loyal companion. The furry outer shell is a Tataru original.
results.tooltip: Uwaaah! Come back, Carbuncle! Come baaack!    - Tataru

sources.text: Item code included with Emerald Carbuncle Plushie

verminion.skill_description: Knocks back all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Cid
results.description: Summon your wind-up Cid minion. When asked, if he had a granddaughter, what would he like to see her named, the Ironworks founder replied, “Gertrude.”
results.enhanced_description: When faced with a lack of coin to fund projects, Garlond Ironworks engineers designed the wind-up Cid, with hopes that sales of the automaton would fill their coffers. Indeed, sales have been impressive, the item bringing in just enough gil to pay for the founder's debts.
results.tooltip: Run, Cid. Or stay. It makes no matter. You cannot escape the past.    - Gaius van Baelsar

verminion.skill_description: Sets a trap which can be activated by button after 10 seconds. When triggered, it delivers an attack with a potency of 180 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Wind-up Alphinaud
results.description: Summon your wind-up Alphinaud minion. Perfect for international summits, family get-togethers, pre- or post-battle gatherings, or any other occasion where the recapitulation of past occurrences is absolutely, positively necessary.
results.enhanced_description: In an attempt to secure funding for the financially strapped organization, the Crystal Braves treasurer took it upon himself to have three score thousand crafted and delivered to Rowena's House of Splendors for sale...where they have been collecting dust since...
results.tooltip: Coming from an influential family certainly has its advantages!   - Wedge

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 13%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Ugly Duckling
results.description: Summon your ugly duckling minion. Will he turn into a graceful swan? Inquiring minds want to know.
results.enhanced_description: After suffering countless barbs from his bullying brothers, this tiny cloudkin had enough and left its home on Neverreap to find someplace he'd be called beautiful, too.
results.tooltip: Hiss at me, he did; fierce as goose, he was.    - Jezul Ahuatan

sources.text: The Palace of the Dead - Bronze Sack

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Owlet
results.description: Summon your owlet minion. Who needs eyes in the back of their head when you can spin your head full circle?
results.enhanced_description: Preserved with temporal magicks and placed on display in the Fractal Continuum, this genetically enhanced cloudkin is documented as being one of the genetic components used in the creation of mirrorknights. He appears to have developed the capacity for reading.
results.tooltip: It is difficult to even remember the last time I spoke with someone other than my good friends the owls.    - Roiteloin

sources.text: The Palace of the Dead - Bronze Sack

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Gestahl
results.description: Summon Gestahl. He's a cute puppy dog. Yes, he is. Yes, he is a cute puppy dog. A cute puppy dog, yes, he is. Awww, such a cute puppy dog... Yes...
results.enhanced_description: Despite being found lapping up day-old vomit behind the Forgotten Knight, the air of nobility displayed by this pup as he rolled in the filth was proof enough of his royal bloodline, and before the night was through, an official pedigree was drawn up, changing Gestahl's life forever.
results.tooltip: Nothing shall stand in our way!    - Emperor Gestahl

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **monsters**.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Lesser Panda
results.description: Summon your lesser panda minion. Lesser only in size to normal pandas. And in life expectancy. And intelligence. And fluffiness. Well, perhaps not fluffiness.
results.enhanced_description: There are several theories as to how a beastkin native to the mist-covered peaks of southeastern Ilsabard ended up thousands of leagues away from its home...and most involve an unhealthy infatuation with the furry creature by a certain imperial legatus.
results.tooltip: Stand up straight, maggot!    - Berkoeya

sources.text: The Palace of the Dead - Bronze Sack

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

results.name: Unicolt
results.description: Summon your unicolt minion. Because two horns are not always better than one.
results.enhanced_description: Symbols of purity and innocence, newborn unicorns are kept by the Ishgardian church to create holy water used in sacred rites─a process that involves the creatures dipping their horns in spring water while a sanctified priest blesses it.
results.tooltip: Four-legged and tall, with a pristine white coat and a single horn protruding from its brow!    - Braya

sources.text: The Palace of the Dead - Bronze Sack

verminion.skill_description:
Increases speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Griffin Hatchling
results.description: Summon your griffin hatchling minion. Not to be confused with a gryphon hatchling, a griffon hatchling, a gryfon hatchling, or a gryphus hatchling.
results.enhanced_description: One night, after ripping the heart from a griffin's breast and holding it aloft for gods and men to behold, a Clan Centurio hunter turned to see a tiny wide-eyed cub shivering in a now-motherless nest. Unable to deliver the steel peace, he rescued the beast and named it Ben.
results.tooltip: You'd be surprised at how many...end up sliced to ribbons by beak and talon.    - Fafafono

sources.text: Ardolain - The Forgotten Knight (Ishgard) - 400 Centurio Seals

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **poppets**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Iron Dwarf
results.description: Summon your iron dwarf minion (though he prefers the term “little iron person”).
results.enhanced_description: What was reported as a “chance discovery” by your mammet voyager, has actually turned out to be a pet project of the automaton to kill the time while piloting the long journeys to the lonely north.
results.tooltip: But if ye've got iron in yer veins...speak up.    - Randwulf

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 60.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Page 63
results.description: Summon your page 63 minion. A detailed recapitulation of the preceding sixty-two pages is not necessary to fully enjoy the content of the sixty-third.
results.enhanced_description: Though unable to read the arcane script penned in blood across this forbidden tome discovered in the Great Gubal Library, you sense much power in the words. Or it could simply be the fact that the book follows you.
results.tooltip: No dusty tome doth capture in ink what these terrible beings are now become.    - Urianger

sources.text: The Palace of the Dead - Bronze Sack

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Gaelikitten
results.description: Summon your gaelikitten minion. Rumors that the gods kill one of these adorable creatures every time a young man thinks pleasurable thoughts are unfounded.
results.enhanced_description: Though its wings appear to be constructs of some sort rather than actual body parts, any who draw close are met with a violent flurry of scratching and punching, making it impossible to thoroughly inspect the creature's backside.
results.tooltip: Watch it! This kitten has claws!    - Aldis

sources.text: The Palace of the Dead - Bronze Sack

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range while inflicting a weakness to **critters**.
**Duration:** 10s

results.name: Atrophied Atomos
results.description: Summon your atrophied Atomos minion. Putting money where this voidsent's mouth is merely results in devoured money.
results.enhanced_description: While the means by which this otherworldly devourer of aether became trapped in a treasure coffer is most certainly a mystery worthy of further investigation, the real question on everyone's minds here is, “Why did you let it out?”
results.tooltip: Let all know that a new threat to the peace has emerged.    - Sixth Astral Era Crier

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **poppets**.
**Duration:** 5s

results.name: Behemoth Heir
results.description: Summon your behemoth heir minion, currently forty-seventh in line to the behemoth throne.
results.enhanced_description: To prove his bravery, a recently inducted member of Clan Centurio journeyed alone into the untamed north and somehow returned unscathed with the broodling of the legendary kaiser behemoth. Not wishing to bring ill fortune on the clan, the pup was quickly passed on...to you.
results.tooltip: Yer mistress fights like a bloody behemoth ten times her size!    - Wounded Chocobo Hunter

sources.text: Ardolain - The Forgotten Knight (Ishgard) - 400 Centurio Seals

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 40.
**Duration:** 15s

results.name: Set Of Primogs
results.description: Summon your set of Primogs minion, the *only* mechanical musicians this side of Black Tea Brook...making them the *greatest* mechanical musicians this side of Black Tea Brook.
results.enhanced_description: One night, an aspiring moogle bard had a dream─a dream to become the greatest musician in all the realm. But to do it he would need a band of merry moogles to accompany him. The bard had no friends, so instead he decided to create his own band from stolen mammet parts.
results.tooltip: Off with their heads!    - Good King Moggle Mog XII

sources.text: Item code included with Before the Fall Original Soundtrack

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Chocobo Chick Courier
results.description: Summon your chocobo chick courier minion. It may not be in your best interest to entrust him with any important missives just yet.
results.enhanced_description: Spiteful claims that this adorable black chocobo hatchling is, in fact, simply another plain yellow chocobo colored with pine tar in a feeble attempt to prey on prospective buyers have only fueled the natural-born flyer's passion to take to the skies.
results.tooltip: Kweh!    - Every Chocobo Ever

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

results.name: Water Imp
results.description: Summon your water imp minion. Legend states these strange creatures can only survive on land as long as the plate atop their heads remains wet.
results.enhanced_description: Even a child knows that there are no such things as water imps...but if that is true, then what in the world could this undeniably imp-like creature be? An undocumented species of gigantoad/salamander hybrid? Or perhaps simply the hapless victim of a misdirected Imp spell?
results.tooltip: Not *more* imps! They'll have all our honey!   - Befuddled Beekeeper

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 40%.
**Duration:** 6s

results.name: Black Coeurl
results.description: Summon your black coeurl minion. Beware, for if one should cross your path, you will experience seven years of...AWWWWWW.
results.enhanced_description: To the untrained eye, this coeurl appears to be of an entirely new species, when in fact the only thing separating him from his mottled brethren is that his spots are so large, they overlap with one another, rendering him completely black.
results.tooltip: Look what the coeurl dragged in.   - Momodi

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

results.name: Model Magitek Bit
results.description: Summon your model magitek bit minion. An exact 1:9 scale replica of a ceruleum-powered magitek bit (Ultima Weapon action figure not included).
results.enhanced_description: This miracle of modern mechanics is actually a miracle of ancient Allagan mechanics reverse engineered and then modified with advanced Garlean magitek technology.
results.tooltip: The Empire owes its might to magitek.   - Yda

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

results.name: Midgardsormr
results.description: Summon Midgardsormr. Not the big one. The little one.
